</div>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:South_Africapop.svg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="800" decoding="async" height="165" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/02/South_Africapop.svg/langzh-220px-South_Africapop.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/02/South_Africapop.svg/langzh-330px-South_Africapop.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/02/South_Africapop.svg/langzh-440px-South_Africapop.svg.png 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:South_Africapop.svg" title="放大"></a></div>南非的<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%BA%E5%8F%A3%E9%87%91%E5%AD%97%E5%A1%94" title="人口金字塔">人口金字塔</a>。</div></div></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="709" data-file-width="809" decoding="async" height="193" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg/220px-South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg/330px-South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg/440px-South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg.png 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_population_density_map.svg" title="放大"></a></div>南非人口密度图 <style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r72850374">@media(min-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .columns-start .column{float:left;min-width:20em}.mw-parser-output .columns-2 .column{width:50%}.mw-parser-output .columns-3 .column{width:33.3%}.mw-parser-output .columns-4 .column{width:25%}.mw-parser-output .columns-5 .column{width:20%}}</style><table class="multicol" role="presentation" style=";border-spacing:0;background:transparent;"> <tbody><tr style="vertical-align:top;"> <td style="width:15.0em;;;"> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ffffcc;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> &lt;1/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ffeda0;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 1–3/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fed976;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 3–10/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #feb24c;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 10–30/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fd8d3c;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 30–100/km<sup>2</sup></div></td> <td style="width:1.25em;"></td> <td style="width:15.0em;;;"> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fc4e2a;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 100–300/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #e31a1c;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 300–1000/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #bc0026;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 1000–3000/km<sup>2</sup></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #800026;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> &gt;3000/km<sup>2</sup></div></td> </tr></tbody></table></div></div></div>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="709" data-file-width="809" decoding="async" height="193" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg/220px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg/330px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg/440px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg.png 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_dominant_population_group_map.svg" title="放大"></a></div>地图显示在南非占优势地位的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Ethnic groups in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非族群"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%97%8F%E7%BE%A4&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非族群（页面不存在）">种族</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_groups_in_South_Africa" title="en:Ethnic groups in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Ethnic groups in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>的地区。 <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r72850374" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><table class="multicol" role="presentation" style=";border-spacing:0;background:transparent;"> <tbody><tr style="vertical-align:top;"> <td style="width:15.0em;;;"> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ffffb3;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%99%BD%E4%BA%BA" title="南非白人">白人</a></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #8dd3c7;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E6%9C%89%E8%89%B2%E4%BA%BA" title="有色人">有色人</a></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fb8072;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E9%BB%91%E4%BA%BA" title="黑人">黑人</a></div></td> <td style="width:1.25em;"></td> <td style="width:15.0em;;;"> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #80b1d3;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Asian South Africans" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="亚裔南非人"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BA%9E%E8%A3%94%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E4%BA%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="亚裔南非人（页面不存在）">亚裔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asian_South_Africans" title="en:Asian South Africans"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Asian South Africans</span></a></span>）</span></span></div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #bebada;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 无一种族占优势</div></td> </tr></tbody></table></div></div></div>
<p>南非是一个拥有约6,014万（2021年）来自不同来源、<a href="/wiki/%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96" title="文化">文化</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80" title="语言">语言</a>以及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99%E4%BF%A1%E4%BB%B0" title="宗教信仰">宗教信仰</a>的人口的国家<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-newpopest_6-5"><a href="#cite_note-newpopest-6">[4]</a></sup>。南非<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African National Census of 2011" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="2011年南非人口普查"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=2011%E5%B9%B4%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E4%BA%BA%E5%8F%A3%E6%99%AE%E6%9F%A5&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="2011年南非人口普查（页面不存在）">上一次人口普查</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_National_Census_of_2011" title="en:South African National Census of 2011"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African National Census of 2011</span></a></span>）</span></span>在2011年举行，至于最近一次调查则为在2016年进行的跨国籍人口调查<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-456"><a href="#cite_note-456">[445]</a></sup>。南非目前有<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9D%9E%E6%B3%95%E7%A7%BB%E6%B0%91" title="南非非法移民">大约500万非法移民</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-thenewslens15541_201-3"><a href="#cite_note-thenewslens15541-201">[192]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-worldhuanqiu6229059_202-3"><a href="#cite_note-worldhuanqiu6229059-202">[193]</a></sup>，其中包括约300万至500万的津巴布韦人<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-457"><a href="#cite_note-457">[446]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-458"><a href="#cite_note-458">[447]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-459"><a href="#cite_note-459">[448]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-460"><a href="#cite_note-460">[449]</a></sup><span id="noteTag-cite_ref-sup"><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-461"><a href="#cite_note-461">[注 12]</a></sup></span>。自2008年5月11日起，南非发生一系列反移民骚乱，困扰着这个国家<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-bbc_462-0"><a href="#cite_note-bbc-462">[450]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-463"><a href="#cite_note-463">[451]</a></sup>。
</p><p><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%B5%B1%E8%A8%88%E5%B1%80" title="南非统计局">南非统计局</a>要求人们在人口普查的五个种族群体中描述自己的身份<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-464"><a href="#cite_note-464">[452]</a></sup>。统计局在2011年人口普查的数据是黑人占79.2%、白人占8.9%、有色人占8.9%、亚裔占2.5%、其他／未指定则占0.5%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-census2011-inbrief_9-1"><a href="#cite_note-census2011-inbrief-9">[6]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cib11_465-0"><a href="#cite_note-cib11-465">[453]</a></sup>。
</p><p>自南非结束种族隔离政策后，一些白人陆续离开南非，当中原因各种各样并不明确。总而言之，白人比例已从1911年的22%下跌至1970年的约17%，且不断降至目前的7.8%。在1911年南非首次人口普查中，白人占总人口22%，但到了1980年则下降至16%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-466"><a href="#cite_note-466">[454]</a></sup>。除了部分白人离开南非的关系外，黑人<a href="/wiki/%E5%87%BA%E7%94%9F%E7%8E%87" title="出生率">出生率</a>较白人及其他种族高亦是白人比例下降的原因之一<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-467"><a href="#cite_note-467">[455]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-468"><a href="#cite_note-468">[456]</a></sup><span id="noteTag-cite_ref-sup"><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-469"><a href="#cite_note-469">[注 13]</a></sup></span>。
</p><p>南非拥有大量的难民与寻求庇护者。根据<a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9B%A3%E6%B0%91%E8%88%87%E7%A7%BB%E6%B0%91%E5%A7%94%E5%93%A1%E6%9C%83" title="美国难民与移民委员会">美国难民与移民委员会</a>发布的《2008年世界难民调查》，2007年南非有大约144,700人为难民或寻求庇护者<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-World_Refugee_Survey_2008_470-0"><a href="#cite_note-World_Refugee_Survey_2008-470">[457]</a></sup>。他们分别来自津巴布韦（48,400人）、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%89%9B%E6%9E%9C%E6%B0%91%E4%B8%BB%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%8B" title="刚果民主共和国">刚果民主共和国</a>（24,800人）及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%A2%E9%A6%AC%E9%87%8C" title="索马里">索马里</a>（12,900人）<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-World_Refugee_Survey_2008_470-1"><a href="#cite_note-World_Refugee_Survey_2008-470">[457]</a></sup>，合共超过100,000人。这些人口主要居住在<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%85%A7%E6%96%AF%E5%A0%A1" title="约翰内斯堡">约翰内斯堡</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%94%E5%8B%92%E9%99%80%E5%88%A9%E4%BA%9E" title="比勒陀利亚">比勒陀利亚</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E7%8F%AD" title="德班">德班</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E6%95%A6" title="开普敦">开普敦</a>以及<a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E8%8E%89%E8%8E%8E%E7%99%BD%E6%B8%AF" title="伊莉莎白港">伊莉莎白港</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-World_Refugee_Survey_2008_470-2"><a href="#cite_note-World_Refugee_Survey_2008-470">[457]</a></sup>。现在，许多难民也开始在<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%99%AE%E9%A6%AC%E8%98%AD%E5%8A%A0%E7%9C%81" title="普马兰加省">普马兰加省</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%A4%B8%E7%A5%96%E9%AD%AF-%E7%B4%8D%E5%A1%94%E7%88%BE%E7%9C%81" title="夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省">夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省</a>及<a href="/wiki/%E6%9D%B1%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E7%9C%81" title="东开普省">东开普省</a>等农村地区工作与生活。
</p>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<h3><span id=".E8.AA.9E.E8.A8.80"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="语言">语言</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=36" title="编辑章节：语言">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80" title="南非语言">南非语言</a></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_(entrance).JPG"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="2048" data-file-width="1536" decoding="async" height="293" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG/220px-Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG/330px-Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG/440px-Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_%28entrance%29.JPG 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Stellenbosch_Magistrate%27s_Office_(entrance).JPG" title="放大"></a></div>用<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%AA%9E" title="南非语">南非语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E8%AA%9E" title="英语">英语</a>及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E8%96%A9%E8%AA%9E" title="科萨语">科萨语</a>三种语言的文字写的政府机构标牌。</div></div></div>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="709" data-file-width="809" decoding="async" height="193" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg/220px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg/330px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg/440px-South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg.png 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:South_Africa_2011_dominant_language_map.svg" title="放大"></a></div>地图显示在南非占优势地位的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80" title="南非语言">语言</a>的地区。 <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #80b1d3;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A5%96%E9%AD%AF%E8%AA%9E" title="祖鲁语">祖鲁语</a>（22.7%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fb8072;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E8%96%A9%E8%AA%9E" title="科萨语">科萨语</a>（16.0%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #8dd3c7;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%AA%9E" title="南非语">南非语</a>（13.5%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ffffb3;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E8%AA%9E" title="英语">英语</a>（9.6%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fdb462;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%8C%97%E7%B4%A2%E6%89%98%E8%AA%9E" title="北索托语">北索托语</a>（9.1%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #fccde5;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8C%A8%E7%93%A6%E7%B4%8D%E8%AA%9E" title="茨瓦纳语">茨瓦纳语</a>（8.0%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #b3de69;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E7%B4%A2%E6%89%98%E8%AA%9E" title="南索托语">南索托语</a>（7.6%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ffed6f;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%81%B0%E5%8A%A0%E8%AA%9E" title="聪加语">聪加语</a>（4.5%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #bc80bd;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%AF%E5%A8%81%E5%A3%AB%E8%AA%9E" title="斯威士语">斯威士语</a>（2.5%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #ccebc5;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a href="/wiki/%E6%96%87%E9%81%94%E8%AA%9E" title="文达语">文达语</a>（2.4%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #bebada;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E6%81%A9%E5%BE%B7%E8%B2%9D%E8%90%8A%E8%AA%9E" title="南恩德贝莱语">南恩德贝莱语</a>（2.1%）</div> <div class="legend"><span class="legend-color" style="border:1px solid black;display:inline-block; height:1.5em; margin:1px; text-align:center; background: #d0d0d0;color:black;font-size:small; width:1.5em"> </span> 无一语言占优势</div></div></div></div>
<p>南非有11种官方语言<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-newscts201809211937745_17-3"><a href="#cite_note-newscts201809211937745-17">[14]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-0"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-472"><a href="#cite_note-472">[459]</a></sup>，分别为南非语、英语、南恩德贝莱语、北索托语、南索托语、斯威士语、聪加语、茨瓦纳语、文达语、科萨语以及祖鲁语。在这方面，南非的官方语言数量仅次于<a href="/wiki/%E7%8E%BB%E5%88%A9%E7%B6%AD%E4%BA%9E" title="玻利维亚">玻利维亚</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6" title="印度">印度</a>与津巴布韦。尽管所有的官方语言的地位都是平等的，但当中有部分官方语言更常用<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-1"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup>。根据2011年人口普查，南非人四种最常说的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80" title="第一语言">第一语言</a>分别为祖鲁语（22.7%）、科萨语（16.0%）、南非语（13.5%）以及英语（9.6%）<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cib11_465-1"><a href="#cite_note-cib11-465">[453]</a></sup>。虽然英语只位列第四，且在2011年时仅有9.6%南非人以其作为第一语言，但英语是南非<a href="/wiki/%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB" title="政治">政界</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%95%86%E6%A5%AD" title="商业">商界</a>及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%82%B3%E5%AA%92" title="传媒">传媒</a>的最主要语言<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn599267_13-14"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn599267-13">[10]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-2"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup>。此外，英语依然为南非事实上的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%80%9A%E7%94%A8%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80" title="通用语言">通用语言</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cib11_465-2"><a href="#cite_note-cib11-465">[453]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-3"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非还承认几种非官方语言，包括<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%87%A1%E9%82%A3%E4%BC%BD%E7%BE%85" title="凡那伽罗">凡那伽罗</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Khoe languages" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="科尔语"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E5%B0%94%E8%AF%AD" title="科尔语">科尔语</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khoe_languages" title="en:Khoe languages"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Khoe languages</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8C%97%E7%B4%A2%E6%89%98%E8%AA%9E" title="北索托语">罗必都语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%8D%E9%A6%AC%E8%AA%9E" title="纳马语">纳马语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8C%97%E6%81%A9%E5%BE%B7%E8%B2%9D%E8%90%8A%E8%AA%9E" title="北恩德贝莱语">北恩德贝莱语</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Phuthi language" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="普地语"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%99%AE%E5%9C%B0%E8%AA%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="普地语（页面不存在）">普地语</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phuthi_language" title="en:Phuthi language"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Phuthi language</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African Sign Language" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非手语"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%89%8B%E8%AA%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非手语（页面不存在）">南非手语</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_Sign_Language" title="en:South African Sign Language"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African Sign Language</span></a></span>）</span></span><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-473"><a href="#cite_note-473">[460]</a></sup>。这些非官方语言可能会在主要使用的区域中当作官方语言使用。
</p><p>桑人与科伊科伊人会说许多向北延伸至<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%8D%E7%B1%B3%E6%AF%94%E4%BA%9E" title="纳米比亚">纳米比亚</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%9A%E8%8C%A8%E7%93%A6%E7%B4%8D" title="博茨瓦纳">博茨瓦纳</a>等国家的非官方语言及<a href="/wiki/%E6%96%B9%E8%A8%80" title="方言">方言</a>。与其他非洲人不同，这些人是源自狩猎采集社会，因此他们有着自己的<a href="/wiki/%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96%E8%AA%8D%E5%90%8C" title="文化认同">文化身份</a>。桑人与科伊科伊人在很大程度上遭到<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A4%BE%E6%9C%83%E6%8E%92%E6%96%A5" title="社会排斥">边缘化</a>，且其语言亦濒临<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80%E6%BB%85%E7%B5%95" title="语言灭绝">灭绝</a>。
</p><p>许多南非白人都会说<a href="/wiki/%E6%AC%A7%E6%B4%B2%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80" title="欧洲语言">欧洲语言</a>，包括<a href="/wiki/%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E7%89%99%E8%AA%9E" title="葡萄牙语">葡萄牙语</a>（亦有来自安哥拉与莫桑比克的移民会说）、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E8%AA%9E" title="德语">德语</a>及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B8%8C%E8%87%98%E8%AA%9E" title="希腊语">希腊语</a>，而部分亚裔南非人会说亚洲语言，例如<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8F%A4%E5%90%89%E6%8B%89%E7%89%B9%E8%AA%9E" title="古吉拉特语">古吉拉特语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%9C%B0%E8%AA%9E" title="印地语">印地语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%B1%B3%E7%88%BE%E8%AA%9E" title="泰米尔语">泰米尔语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%9B%A7%E5%9B%BA%E8%AA%9E" title="泰卢固语">泰卢固语</a>以及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%83%8F%E7%88%BE%E9%83%BD%E8%AA%9E" title="乌尔都语">乌尔都语</a>。至于在南非的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E6%B3%95%E8%AA%9E" title="非洲法语">非洲法语圈国家</a>移民则说<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E6%B3%95%E8%AA%9E" title="非洲法语">非洲法语</a>。
</p>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<h3><span id=".E5.9F.8E.E5.B8.82"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="城市">城市</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=37" title="编辑章节：城市">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>2000年，有95%白人与亚洲人、79%有色人以及41%黑人于城市内居住。2005年，居住在城市住区的人数占总人口比例的59.5%，这比例到了2015年时增至64.8%。<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Homelessness in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非露宿者"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9C%B2%E5%AE%BF%E8%80%85&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非露宿者（页面不存在）">住房短缺</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homelessness_in_South_Africa" title="en:Homelessness in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Homelessness in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>与基础设施不足是城市地区的主要问题之一<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-474"><a href="#cite_note-474">[461]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-475"><a href="#cite_note-475">[462]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-476"><a href="#cite_note-476">[463]</a></sup>。因此，城市周边地区特点是非正规的住房结构，如<a href="/wiki/%E5%AF%AE%E5%B1%8B" title="寮屋">寮屋</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%B2%A7%E6%B0%91%E7%AA%9F" title="贫民窟">贫民窟</a>等<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-477"><a href="#cite_note-477">[464]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hklifestyleappledaily20104748_478-0"><a href="#cite_note-hklifestyleappledaily20104748-478">[465]</a></sup>。目前，南非<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%BB%BA%E7%AF%89%E6%A5%AD" title="建筑业">建筑业</a>无法满足南非日益增长的住房需求，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%A2%E7%B6%AD%E6%89%98" title="索维托">索维托</a>等黑人城市面临着<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BA%BA%E5%8F%A3%E9%81%8E%E5%89%A9" title="人口过剩">人口过剩</a>的问题<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hklifestyleappledaily20104748_478-1"><a href="#cite_note-hklifestyleappledaily20104748-478">[465]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-479"><a href="#cite_note-479">[466]</a></sup>。在该城市中，仍有300万至400万人居住在130平方公里的区域内。
</p><p>在种族隔离结束后，中产阶级及上层阶级的传统白人生活区受社会变化的影响较小。旧的黑人聚集区在很大程度上得以保留，因为只有少数黑人可以负担白人生活区的房价与租金。而少数迁移到白人住宅区的非白人居民则可以很容易地融入白人中。
</p><p>黑人人口的<a href="/wiki/%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%8C%96" title="城市化">城市化</a>进程在21世纪初期继续，预计农村人口将缩减5%至10%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-worldpeople27066517_480-0"><a href="#cite_note-worldpeople27066517-480">[467]</a></sup>。
</p><p><br/>
</p>
<table class="navbox info" width="100%">

<th colspan="10" style="padding: 0.2em 1em 0.2em 1em; line-height: 1.3em;"><div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini" style="float: left;"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E6%8E%92%E5%90%8D" title="Template:南非最大城市排名"><abbr title="查看该模板">查</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E6%8E%92%E5%90%8D" title="Template talk:南非最大城市排名"><abbr title="讨论该模板">论</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E6%8E%92%E5%90%8D&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="编辑该模板">编</abbr></a></li></ul></div> <span style="font-size:120%;"><a class="mw-selflink selflink">南非</a>最大城市排名</span><br/><span style="font-weight:normal;"><small>2016年社区调查<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-481"><a href="#cite_note-481">[468]</a></sup>、世界城市化前景：2018年修订版<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-482"><a href="#cite_note-482">[469]</a></sup></small></span>

<tr>

</td></tr>
<tr>
<td align="center" style="background:#f0f0f0;">4</td>

</td></tr>
<tr>
<td align="center" style="background:#f0f0f0;">5</td>
<td align="left"><b><a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E8%8E%89%E8%8E%8E%E7%99%BD%E6%B8%AF" title="伊莉莎白港">伊莉莎白港</a></b></td>
<td align="left"><a href="/wiki/%E6%9D%B1%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E7%9C%81" title="东开普省">东开普省</a></td>
<td style="text-align:right;padding:0 0.3em 0 0;">1,263,051
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td align="center" style="background:#f0f0f0;">6</td>
<td align="left"><b><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%B0%BC%E6%AC%A3" title="弗里尼欣">弗里尼欣</a></b></td>
<td align="left"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B1%AA%E7%99%BB%E7%9C%81" title="豪登省">豪登省</a></td>
<td style="text-align:right;padding:0 0.3em 0 0;">957,528
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td align="center" style="background:#f0f0f0;">7</td>
<td align="left"><b><a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%A2%E8%82%96%E5%8F%A4%E7%B6%AD" title="索肖古维">索肖古维</a></b></td>
<td align="left"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B1%AA%E7%99%BB%E7%9C%81" title="豪登省">豪登省</a></td>

</td></tr>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<h3><span id=".E5.AE.97.E6.95.99"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="宗教">宗教</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=38" title="编辑章节：宗教">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Religion in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非宗教"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非宗教（页面不存在）">南非宗教</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion_in_South_Africa" title="en:Religion in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Religion in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="2448" data-file-width="3264" decoding="async" height="165" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/25/Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg/220px-Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/25/Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg/330px-Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/25/Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg/440px-Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Wolmaransstad-NG_Kerk-001.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Dutch Reformed Church" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="荷兰归正教"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%8D%B7%E8%98%AD%E6%AD%B8%E6%AD%A3%E6%95%99&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="荷兰归正教（页面不存在）">荷兰归正教</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_Reformed_Church" title="en:Dutch Reformed Church"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Dutch Reformed Church</span></a></span>）</span></span>位于<a href="/wiki/%E6%B2%83%E7%88%BE%E9%A6%AC%E6%9C%97%E6%96%AF%E5%A1%94%E5%BE%B7" title="沃尔马朗斯塔德">沃尔马朗斯塔德</a>的<a href="/wiki/%E6%95%99%E5%A0%82" title="教堂">教堂</a>。</div></div></div>
<div class="barbox tright" style="overflow-x: auto;">
<div style="border:1px solid silver; font-size:88%; padding:0.4em; width:auto; background: white;">
<table style="text-align:left; border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tbody><tr style="background:#ddd"><th colspan="5" style="text-align:center;">南非宗教分布（2016年）</th></tr>
<tr style="font-size:88%; height:4px;">
<td colspan="2" style="padding:0 4px; text-align:left;">宗教</td>
<td style="width:100px; text-align:left;"></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding:0 4px; width:1em; text-align:right;">百分率</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%9F%BA%E7%9D%A3%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="基督宗教">基督宗教</a></td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:#b57edc; width:78.0%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">78.0%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%84%A1%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="无宗教">无宗教</a></td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:black; width:10.9%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">10.9%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;"><a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="非洲传统宗教">非洲传统宗教</a></td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:darkblue; width:4.4%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">4.4%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E8%98%AD%E6%95%99" title="伊斯兰教">伊斯兰教</a></td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:green; width:1.6%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">1.6%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;"><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E6%95%99" title="印度教">印度教</a></td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:orange; width:1.0%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">1.0%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 0.4em; padding-right: 0.4em; min-width: 8em;">其他信仰</td>
<td style="width: 100px; border-left: solid 1px silver; border-right: solid 1px silver;"><div style="background:silver; width:2.7%; overflow: hidden;"> </div></td>
<td colspan="2" style="padding-left: 1.2em; padding-right: 0.4em; text-align: right;">2.7%</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
</div>
<p>根据2016年南非人口普查，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%9F%BA%E7%9D%A3%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="基督宗教">基督宗教</a>教徒占南非人口的78.0%，当中大多数人信奉<a href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E6%95%99" title="新教">新教</a><span id="noteTag-cite_ref-sup"><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-483"><a href="#cite_note-483">[注 14]</a></sup></span>，少数则信奉<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E9%A6%AC%E5%A4%A9%E4%B8%BB%E6%95%99" title="罗马天主教">天主教</a>或者其他教派<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-statssa.gov_484-0"><a href="#cite_note-statssa.gov-484">[470]</a></sup>。除了新教之外，其他基督宗教教派有19.7%的人信奉。<a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="非洲传统宗教">非洲传统宗教</a>占4.4%、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E8%98%AD%E6%95%99" title="伊斯兰教">伊斯兰教</a>占人口的1.6%、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E6%95%99" title="印度教">印度教</a>占1.0%。10.9%<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%84%A1%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99%E4%BF%A1%E4%BB%B0" title="无宗教信仰">无宗教信仰</a>、2.7%信奉其他宗教、1.4%没有指定<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-factbook_376-2"><a href="#cite_note-factbook-376">[365]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-statssa.gov_484-1"><a href="#cite_note-statssa.gov-484">[470]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-state.gov_485-0"><a href="#cite_note-state.gov-485">[471]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-486"><a href="#cite_note-486">[472]</a></sup>。
</p><p>由非洲人发起的教会组成了最大的基督宗教团体，而许多声称与任何有组织宗教无关的人则仍坚持信奉<a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99" title="非洲传统宗教">非洲传统宗教</a>。南非估计有20万原住民传统治疗师<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-487"><a href="#cite_note-487">[473]</a></sup>，高达60%的南非人会向这些治疗师咨询<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-488"><a href="#cite_note-488">[474]</a></sup>，他们通常称为“<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Traditional healers of Southern Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南部非洲传统治疗师"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%83%A8%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E6%B2%BB%E7%99%82%E5%B8%AB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南部非洲传统治疗师（页面不存在）">桑格玛斯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_healers_of_Southern_Africa" title="en:Traditional healers of Southern Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Traditional healers of Southern Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>”或者“<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Traditional healers of Southern Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南部非洲传统治疗师"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%83%A8%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E6%B2%BB%E7%99%82%E5%B8%AB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南部非洲传统治疗师（页面不存在）">伊尼扬加</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_healers_of_Southern_Africa" title="en:Traditional healers of Southern Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Traditional healers of Southern Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>”<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-489"><a href="#cite_note-489">[475]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-490"><a href="#cite_note-490">[476]</a></sup>。治疗师们会结合祖先的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%A5%9E%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC" title="精神资本">精神信仰</a>，以及对当地动植物的精神与药用特性的信念来促进客户康复，这种治疗方法通常称为“<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Traditional African medicine" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="传统非洲医学"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%82%B3%E7%B5%B1%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E9%86%AB%E5%AD%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="传统非洲医学（页面不存在）">穆提</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_African_medicine" title="en:Traditional African medicine"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Traditional African medicine</span></a></span>）</span></span>”<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-491"><a href="#cite_note-491">[477]</a></sup>。不少民族均融合了基督教及原住民宗教的习俗<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-DoS_492-0"><a href="#cite_note-DoS-492">[478]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非的穆斯林主要包括<a href="/wiki/%E6%9C%89%E8%89%B2%E4%BA%BA" title="有色人">有色人</a>及<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E4%BA%BA" title="印度人">印度人</a>群体，他们从非洲其他地区加入南非的黑人或白人穆斯林群体<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-csmonitor_493-0"><a href="#cite_note-csmonitor-493">[479]</a></sup>。南非穆斯林声称，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E8%98%AD%E6%95%99" title="伊斯兰教">他们的信仰</a>是<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Islam in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非伊斯兰教"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E8%98%AD%E6%95%99&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非伊斯兰教（页面不存在）">南非增长速度最快的宗教</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islam_in_South_Africa" title="en:Islam in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Islam in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-494"><a href="#cite_note-494">[480]</a></sup>。黑人穆斯林数量由1991年的12,000人升至2004年的74,700人，增长达六倍<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-csmonitor_493-1"><a href="#cite_note-csmonitor-493">[479]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-495"><a href="#cite_note-495">[481]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非也是<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%8C%B6%E5%A4%AA%E4%BA%BA" title="犹太人">犹太人</a>的家园之一，主要是来自<a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E4%BB%80%E8%82%AF%E7%B4%8D%E8%8C%B2%E7%8C%B6%E5%A4%AA%E4%BA%BA" title="阿什肯纳兹犹太人">欧洲的犹太人</a>，他们是南非少数欧洲移民之中的少数派<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-496"><a href="#cite_note-496">[482]</a></sup>。<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African Jews" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非犹太人"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%8C%B6%E5%A4%AA%E4%BA%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非犹太人（页面不存在）">南非犹太人</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_Jews" title="en:South African Jews"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African Jews</span></a></span>）</span></span>在1970年代达到顶峰，但目前只剩下约67,000人，至于其余的犹太人已经离开南非。即使如此，这些人口亦使南非成为世界第12大的犹太人社区<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-497"><a href="#cite_note-497">[483]</a></sup>。
</p><p>印度教的教徒构成南非人口的另一重要部分<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-498"><a href="#cite_note-498">[484]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h2><span id=".E6.96.87.E5.8C.96"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="文化">文化</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=39" title="编辑章节：文化">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">主条目：<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96" title="南非文化">南非文化</a></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="555" data-file-width="800" decoding="async" height="153" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e8/SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg/220px-SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e8/SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg/330px-SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e8/SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg/440px-SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:SouthAfricaDecoratedHouses.jpg" title="放大"></a></div>德拉肯斯堡的装饰房屋。</div></div></div>
<p>南非大多数黑人都是<a href="/wiki/%E8%BE%B2%E6%B0%91" title="农民">农民</a>，且依旧在贫困的农村中挣扎，但该地区亦正是南非传统文化保留得最完整的地方<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-499"><a href="#cite_note-499">[485]</a></sup>。不过，随着越来越多黑人开始变得<a href="/wiki/%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%8C%96" title="城市化">城市化</a>与<a href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E5%8C%96" title="西方化">西方化</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-worldpeople27066517_480-1"><a href="#cite_note-worldpeople27066517-480">[467]</a></sup>，这些传统文化正在渐渐消失。原本南非的中产阶级几乎全是白人，到了现在，不少黑人、有色人及印度人都跻身中产阶级行列<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-guancha232457_29-11"><a href="#cite_note-guancha232457-29">[25]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-ntdtva903243_187-2"><a href="#cite_note-ntdtva903243-187">[178]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cantdtva889150_188-2"><a href="#cite_note-cantdtva889150-188">[179]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-500"><a href="#cite_note-500">[486]</a></sup>，他们的生活方式也与<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E6%AD%90" title="西欧">西欧</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8C%97%E7%BE%8E%E6%B4%B2" title="北美洲">北美洲</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%BE%B3%E5%A4%A7%E6%8B%89%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9E" title="澳大拉西亚">澳大拉西亚</a>等诸多地区的人们越来越相似。
</p><p><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%AB%A5%E8%BB%8D" title="南非童军">南非童军</a>是南非首个向全国所有种族的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Youth in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非青年"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非青年（页面不存在）">青年</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Youth_in_South_Africa" title="en:Youth in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Youth in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>与成年人开放的一个<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E7%B5%84%E7%B9%94" title="青年组织">青年组织</a>之一。1977年7月2日，该组织在一场名为“君往何处去”的会议上通过该决议<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-scouthistorypage_501-0"><a href="#cite_note-scouthistorypage-501">[487]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h3><span id=".E8.97.9D.E8.A1.93"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="艺术">艺术</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=40" title="编辑章节：艺术">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African literature" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非文学"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%96%87%E5%AD%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非文学（页面不存在）">南非文学</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_literature" title="en:South African literature"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African literature</span></a></span>）</span></span>和<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African poetry" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非诗歌"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%A9%A9%E6%AD%8C&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非诗歌（页面不存在）">南非诗歌</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_poetry" title="en:South African poetry"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African poetry</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:San_Painting,_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="1494" data-file-width="2986" decoding="async" height="110" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG/220px-San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG/330px-San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9b/San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG/440px-San_Painting%2C_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:San_Painting,_Ukalamba_Drakensberge_1.JPG" title="放大"></a></div>在德拉肯斯堡山脉中描绘<a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E8%98%AD%E7%BE%9A%E7%BE%8A" title="伊兰羚羊">伊兰羚羊</a>的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E6%B4%9E%E5%A3%81%E7%95%AB" title="石洞壁画">石洞壁画</a>。</div></div></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:172px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Olive_Schreiner.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="535" data-file-width="349" decoding="async" height="261" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Olive_Schreiner.jpg/170px-Olive_Schreiner.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Olive_Schreiner.jpg/255px-Olive_Schreiner.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Olive_Schreiner.jpg/340px-Olive_Schreiner.jpg 2x" width="170"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Olive_Schreiner.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Olive Schreiner" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="奥利维·施赖纳"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E6%96%BD%E8%B3%B4%E7%B4%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="奥利维·施赖纳（页面不存在）">奥利维·施赖纳</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olive_Schreiner" title="en:Olive Schreiner"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Olive Schreiner</span></a></span>）</span></span>。</div></div></div>
<p><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African art" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非艺术"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%97%9D%E8%A1%93&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非艺术（页面不存在）">南非的艺术品</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_art" title="en:South African art"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African art</span></a></span>）</span></span>包含一些世界上最古老的<a href="/wiki/%E8%97%9D%E8%A1%93%E5%93%81" title="艺术品">艺术品</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-502"><a href="#cite_note-502">[488]</a></sup>，这些艺术品都是出土于南非的一些洞穴内，其历史可追溯至75,000年之前<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-503"><a href="#cite_note-503">[489]</a></sup>，这些画作与岩画可以在南非全国3,000多个地方找到<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-504"><a href="#cite_note-504">[490]</a></sup>。几个世纪以来，<a href="/wiki/%E6%9C%A8%E9%9B%95" title="木雕">木雕</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E7%8F%8D%E7%8F%A0" title="珍珠">珍珠</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B7%A5%E8%97%9D%E5%93%81" title="工艺品">工艺品</a>以及<a href="/wiki/%E9%99%B6%E5%99%A8" title="陶器">陶器</a>一直是南非艺术品的特色，这些艺术品至今仍可以在南非许多地方找到<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-globalsmes435_505-0"><a href="#cite_note-globalsmes435-505">[491]</a></sup>。目前，南非艺术品经常使用如<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%BA%E9%80%A0%E7%BA%96%E7%B6%AD" title="人造纤维">人造纤维</a>等的现代材料来制作。在大约公元前10000年，迁到南非的<a href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E4%BC%8A%E6%A1%91%E4%BA%BA" title="科伊桑人">科伊桑人</a>的分散部落开始拥有他们自己的文化与艺术风格，也就是现今众多出土的洞穴壁画<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn599267_13-15"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn599267-13">[10]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-globalsmes435_505-1"><a href="#cite_note-globalsmes435-505">[491]</a></sup>。然而，班图人及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Nguni people" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="恩古尼人"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%81%A9%E5%8F%A4%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="恩古尼人（页面不存在）">恩古尼人</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nguni_people" title="en:Nguni people"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Nguni people</span></a></span>）</span></span>的文化与艺术形式其后取代了这些洞穴壁画<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-globalsmes435_505-2"><a href="#cite_note-globalsmes435-505">[491]</a></sup>。在<a href="/wiki/%E7%A4%A6%E4%BA%95" title="矿井">矿井</a>与<a href="/wiki/%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82" title="城市">城市</a>里，新的艺术形式逐渐进化及演变：使用从<a href="/wiki/%E5%A1%91%E6%96%99" title="塑料">塑料条</a>到<a href="/wiki/%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%8C%E8%BB%8A" title="自行车">自行车条</a>等各种东西的动态艺术。从1850年代开始，受到<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8D%B7%E8%98%AD%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96" title="荷兰文化">荷兰文化</a>所影响的<a href="/wiki/%E6%B0%91%E9%96%93%E8%97%9D%E8%A1%93" title="民间艺术">民间艺术</a>家、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Trekboer" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="游牧布尔人"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%83%E7%88%BE%E4%BA%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="游牧布尔人（页面不存在）">游牧布尔人</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trekboer" title="en:Trekboer"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Trekboer</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及不断跟随变化中的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Culture of Europe" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="欧洲文化"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="欧洲文化（页面不存在）">欧洲传统文化</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Culture_of_Europe" title="en:Culture of Europe"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Culture of Europe</span></a></span>）</span></span>的白人艺术家至今为止也依旧给这个在进化中<a href="/wiki/%E5%A4%9A%E5%85%83%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96" title="多元文化">文化混合体</a>作出贡献<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-globalsmes435_505-3"><a href="#cite_note-globalsmes435-505">[491]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非文学发源于其独特的政治、社会及历史等各方面。由黑人作家<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Sol Plaatje" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="索尔·普拉奇"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%A2%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E6%99%AE%E6%8B%89%E5%A5%87&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="索尔·普拉奇（页面不存在）">索尔·普拉奇</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sol_Plaatje" title="en:Sol Plaatje"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Sol Plaatje</span></a></span>）</span></span>于1930年写的《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Mhudi" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="姆胡迪"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A7%86%E8%83%A1%E8%BF%AA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="姆胡迪（页面不存在）">姆胡迪</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mhudi" title="en:Mhudi"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Mhudi</span></a></span>）</span></span>》是首部以<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80" title="非洲语言">非洲语言</a>创作的着名<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E8%AA%AA" title="小说">小说</a>之一。在1950年代，《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Drum (South African magazine)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="鼓声 (南非杂志)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%BC%93%E8%81%B2_(%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9B%9C%E8%AA%8C)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="鼓声 (南非杂志)（页面不存在）">鼓声</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drum_(South_African_magazine)" title="en:Drum (South African magazine)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Drum (South African magazine)</span></a></span>）</span></span>》杂志成为<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%AB%B7%E5%88%BA" title="讽刺">政治讽刺</a>、小说及<a href="/wiki/%E6%95%A3%E6%96%87" title="散文">散文</a>的发源地，并为城市黑人发声的一种文化。
</p><p>值得注意的白人作家包括<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Alan Paton" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="艾伦·帕顿"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%89%BE%E5%80%AB%C2%B7%E5%B8%95%E9%A0%93&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="艾伦·帕顿（页面不存在）">艾伦·帕顿</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Paton" title="en:Alan Paton"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Alan Paton</span></a></span>）</span></span>，他于1948年出版着名小说《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Cry, the Beloved Country" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="哭吧，我心爱的祖国"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%93%AD%E5%90%A7%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E5%BF%83%E6%84%9B%E7%9A%84%E7%A5%96%E5%9C%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="哭吧，我心爱的祖国（页面不存在）">哭吧，我心爱的祖国</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cry,_the_Beloved_Country" title="en:Cry, the Beloved Country"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Cry, the Beloved Country</span></a></span>）</span></span>》。1991年，<a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%8D%E4%B8%81%C2%B7%E6%88%88%E8%BF%AA%E9%BB%98" title="纳丁·戈迪默">纳丁·戈迪默</a>获得<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%AB%BE%E8%B2%9D%E7%88%BE%E6%96%87%E5%AD%B8%E7%8D%8E" title="诺贝尔文学奖">诺贝尔文学奖</a>，成为首位获得诺贝尔文学奖的南非人<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cnnytimes20140715_506-0"><a href="#cite_note-cnnytimes20140715-506">[492]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-507"><a href="#cite_note-507">[493]</a></sup>，她的着名小说《<a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%83%E6%9C%88%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91" title="七月的人民">七月的人民</a>》于1981年发表<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cnnytimes20140715_506-1"><a href="#cite_note-cnnytimes20140715-506">[492]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-508"><a href="#cite_note-508">[494]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-509"><a href="#cite_note-509">[495]</a></sup>。<a href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E7%BF%B0%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF%E7%BB%B4%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E5%BA%93%E5%88%87" title="约翰·马克斯维尔·库切">约翰·马克斯维尔·库切</a>获得诺贝尔文学奖<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-510"><a href="#cite_note-510">[496]</a></sup>，在颁奖时，<a href="/wiki/%E7%91%9E%E5%85%B8%E5%AD%A6%E9%99%A2" title="瑞典学院">瑞典学院</a>表示库切“以无数的伪装描绘了局外人的惊人参与”<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Swedish_Academy_511-0"><a href="#cite_note-Swedish_Academy-511">[497]</a></sup>。
</p><p><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Athol Fugard" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿瑟尔·富加德"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E7%91%9F%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E5%AF%8C%E5%8A%A0%E5%BE%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿瑟尔·富加德（页面不存在）">阿瑟尔·富加德</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athol_Fugard" title="en:Athol Fugard"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Athol Fugard</span></a></span>）</span></span>的剧目定期在南非、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6" title="伦敦">伦敦</a>（<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Royal Court Theatre" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="皇家宫廷剧院"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%9A%87%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%AE%E5%BB%B7%E5%8A%87%E9%99%A2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="皇家宫廷剧院（页面不存在）">皇家宫廷剧院</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Court_Theatre" title="en:Royal Court Theatre"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Royal Court Theatre</span></a></span>）</span></span>）及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84" title="纽约">纽约</a>三地的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Fringe theatre" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="边缘剧院"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%82%8A%E7%B7%A3%E5%8A%87%E9%99%A2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="边缘剧院（页面不存在）">边缘剧院</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fringe_theatre" title="en:Fringe theatre"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Fringe theatre</span></a></span>）</span></span>首演。<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Olive Schreiner" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="奥利维·施赖纳"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E6%96%BD%E8%B3%B4%E7%B4%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="奥利维·施赖纳（页面不存在）">奥利维·施赖纳</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olive_Schreiner" title="en:Olive Schreiner"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Olive Schreiner</span></a></span>）</span></span>的《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Story of an African Farm" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="非洲农场的故事"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E8%BE%B2%E5%A0%B4%E7%9A%84%E6%95%85%E4%BA%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="非洲农场的故事（页面不存在）">非洲农场的故事</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Story_of_an_African_Farm" title="en:The Story of an African Farm"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Story of an African Farm</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1883年）是<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Victorian literature" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="维多利亚文学"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B6%AD%E5%A4%9A%E5%88%A9%E4%BA%9E%E6%96%87%E5%AD%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="维多利亚文学（页面不存在）">维多利亚文学</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victorian_literature" title="en:Victorian literature"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Victorian literature</span></a></span>）</span></span>的一个启示：许多人认为将<a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%B3%E6%80%A7%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9" title="女性主义">女性主义</a>引入了小说形式。
</p><p><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Breyten Breytenbach" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="布雷滕·布雷特巴克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83%E9%9B%B7%E6%BB%95%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E9%9B%B7%E7%89%B9%E5%B7%B4%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="布雷滕·布雷特巴克（页面不存在）">布雷滕·布雷特巴克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breyten_Breytenbach" title="en:Breyten Breytenbach"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Breyten Breytenbach</span></a></span>）</span></span>因参与<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Anti-Apartheid Movement" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="反种族隔离运动"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E7%A8%AE%E6%97%8F%E9%9A%94%E9%9B%A2%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="反种族隔离运动（页面不存在）">反对种族隔离的游击运动</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anti-Apartheid_Movement" title="en:Anti-Apartheid Movement"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Anti-Apartheid Movement</span></a></span>）</span></span>而<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%85%A5%E7%8D%84" title="入狱">入狱</a>。1979年，<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="André Brink" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="安德烈·布林克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E7%83%88%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E6%9E%97%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="安德烈·布林克（页面不存在）">安德烈·布林克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Brink" title="en:André Brink"><span dir="auto" lang="en">André Brink</span></a></span>）</span></span>在出版《<a href="/wiki/%E8%A1%80%E6%9F%93%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%A3%E7%AF%80" title="血染的季节">血染的季节</a>》后受到当时白人政府的打压，是南非首位出版小说后遭打压的作家<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-512"><a href="#cite_note-512">[498]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h3><span id=".E5.AA.92.E9.AB.94.E8.88.87.E6.B5.81.E8.A1.8C.E6.96.87.E5.8C.96"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="媒体与流行文化">媒体与流行文化</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=41" title="编辑章节：媒体与流行文化">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Media of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非媒体"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%AA%92%E9%AB%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非媒体（页面不存在）">南非媒体</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_of_South_Africa" title="en:Media of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Media of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Music of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非音乐"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9F%B3%E6%A8%82&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非音乐（页面不存在）">南非音乐</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_of_South_Africa" title="en:Music of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Music of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>和<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Cinema of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非电影"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9B%BB%E5%BD%B1&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非电影（页面不存在）">南非电影</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinema_of_South_Africa" title="en:Cinema of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Cinema of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="576" data-file-width="823" decoding="async" height="154" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg/220px-SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg/330px-SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg/440px-SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:SouthAfricanBroadcastingCorporationHQ.jpg" title="放大"></a></div>位于约翰内斯堡的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%BB%A3%E6%92%AD%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="南非广播公司">南非广播公司</a>总部。</div></div></div>
<p>南非拥有<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Media of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非媒体"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%AA%92%E9%AB%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非媒体（页面不存在）">庞大的传媒事业</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_of_South_Africa" title="en:Media of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Media of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>，是非洲主要的传媒中心之一。南非许多广播公司与报刊表现出国内人口多元的性质<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-guancha232457_29-12"><a href="#cite_note-guancha232457-29">[25]</a></sup>，主要使用的语言是英语<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-4"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup>。不过，其他十种官方语言都有在不同程度上使用<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-epochtimesn285004_471-5"><a href="#cite_note-epochtimesn285004-471">[458]</a></sup>。
</p><p><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Music of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非音乐"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9F%B3%E6%A8%82&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非音乐（页面不存在）">南非音乐</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_of_South_Africa" title="en:Music of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Music of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>有很多种<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-513"><a href="#cite_note-513">[499]</a></sup>。黑人<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9F%B3%E6%A8%82%E5%AE%B6" title="音乐家">音乐家</a>创造了一种名为<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Kwaito" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="库威多"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BA%AB%E5%A8%81%E5%A4%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="库威多（页面不存在）">库威多</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kwaito" title="en:Kwaito"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Kwaito</span></a></span>）</span></span>的独特<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9F%B3%E6%A8%82%E9%A1%9E%E5%9E%8B" title="音乐类型">风格</a>，并对<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%BB%A3%E6%92%AD" title="广播">广播</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96" title="电视">电视</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%9B%9C%E8%AA%8C" title="杂志">杂志</a>等媒体产生影响<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-514"><a href="#cite_note-514">[500]</a></sup>。值得注意的是<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Brenda Fassie" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="布兰达·法西"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83%E8%98%AD%E9%81%94%C2%B7%E6%B3%95%E8%A5%BF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="布兰达·法西（页面不存在）">布兰达·法西</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brenda_Fassie" title="en:Brenda Fassie"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Brenda Fassie</span></a></span>）</span></span>，她的歌曲《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Weekend Special" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="特别周末"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%89%B9%E5%88%A5%E9%80%B1%E6%9C%AB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="特别周末（页面不存在）">特别周末</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weekend_Special" title="en:Weekend Special"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Weekend Special</span></a></span>）</span></span>》以英语演唱而名声大噪。更多着名的传统音乐家包括<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Ladysmith Black Mambazo" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="莱迪史密斯·布莱克·马巴索"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%90%8A%E8%BF%AA%E5%8F%B2%E5%AF%86%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E8%90%8A%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%B7%B4%E7%B4%A2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="莱迪史密斯·布莱克·马巴索（页面不存在）">莱迪史密斯·布莱克·马巴索</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ladysmith_Black_Mambazo" title="en:Ladysmith Black Mambazo"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Ladysmith Black Mambazo</span></a></span>）</span></span>，而<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Soweto String Quartet" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="索维托弦乐四重奏"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%A2%E7%B6%AD%E6%89%98%E5%BC%A6%E6%A8%82%E5%9B%9B%E9%87%8D%E5%A5%8F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="索维托弦乐四重奏（页面不存在）">索维托弦乐四重奏</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soweto_String_Quartet" title="en:Soweto String Quartet"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Soweto String Quartet</span></a></span>）</span></span>则演奏非洲风味的经典音乐。南非产生了世界着名的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%88%B5%E5%A3%AB%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90" title="爵士音乐">爵士音乐</a>家，特别是<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Hugh Masekela" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="休·马西克拉"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%91%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E8%A5%BF%E5%85%8B%E6%8B%89&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="休·马西克拉（页面不存在）">休·马西克拉</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_Masekela" title="en:Hugh Masekela"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Hugh Masekela</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jonas Gwangwa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="霍纳斯·格汪瓦"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%9C%8D%E7%B4%8D%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%A0%BC%E6%B1%AA%E7%93%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="霍纳斯·格汪瓦（页面不存在）">霍纳斯·格汪瓦</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonas_Gwangwa" title="en:Jonas Gwangwa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jonas Gwangwa</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Abdullah Ibrahim" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿卜杜拉·易卜拉欣"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%8D%9C%E6%9D%9C%E6%8B%89%C2%B7%E6%98%93%E5%8D%9C%E6%8B%89%E6%AC%A3&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿卜杜拉·易卜拉欣（页面不存在）">阿卜杜拉·易卜拉欣</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abdullah_Ibrahim" title="en:Abdullah Ibrahim"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Abdullah Ibrahim</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E7%B1%B3%E7%91%9E%E5%AE%89%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%8D%A1%E8%B2%9D" title="米瑞安·马卡贝">米瑞安·马卡贝</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jonathan Butler" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="乔纳森·巴特勒"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E7%B4%8D%E6%A3%AE%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E7%89%B9%E5%8B%92&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="乔纳森·巴特勒（页面不存在）">乔纳森·巴特勒</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_Butler" title="en:Jonathan Butler"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jonathan Butler</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Chris McGregor" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="克里斯·麦格雷戈"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%85%8B%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E6%A0%BC%E9%9B%B7%E6%88%88&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="克里斯·麦格雷戈（页面不存在）">克里斯·麦格雷戈</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_McGregor" title="en:Chris McGregor"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Chris McGregor</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Sathima Bea Benjamin" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="萨马·贝亚·本杰明"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%96%A9%E9%A6%AC%C2%B7%E8%B2%9D%E4%BA%9E%C2%B7%E6%9C%AC%E5%82%91%E6%98%8E&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="萨马·贝亚·本杰明（页面不存在）">萨马·贝亚·本杰明</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sathima_Bea_Benjamin" title="en:Sathima Bea Benjamin"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Sathima Bea Benjamin</span></a></span>）</span></span>。南非语音乐涵盖多种类型，如当代的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Steve Hofmeyr" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="史蒂夫·霍夫梅尔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8F%B2%E8%92%82%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E9%9C%8D%E5%A4%AB%E6%A2%85%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="史蒂夫·霍夫梅尔（页面不存在）">史蒂夫·霍夫梅尔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Hofmeyr" title="en:Steve Hofmeyr"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Steve Hofmeyr</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%BE%90%E5%85%8B%E6%90%96%E6%BB%BE" title="庞克摇滚">庞克摇滚</a>乐队<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Fokofpolisiekar" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Fokofpolisiekar"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Fokofpolisiekar&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Fokofpolisiekar（页面不存在）">Fokofpolisiekar</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fokofpolisiekar" title="en:Fokofpolisiekar"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Fokofpolisiekar</span></a></span>）</span></span>及<a href="/wiki/%E5%89%B5%E4%BD%9C%E6%AD%8C%E6%89%8B" title="创作歌手">创作歌手</a><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jeremy Loops" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="杰里米·罗波斯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%82%91%E9%87%8C%E7%B1%B3%C2%B7%E7%BE%85%E6%B3%A2%E6%96%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="杰里米·罗波斯（页面不存在）">杰里米·罗波斯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeremy_Loops" title="en:Jeremy Loops"><span dir="auto"
