lang="en">Jeremy Loops</span></a></span>）</span></span>。
</p><p>虽然在南非以外制作的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Cinema of South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非电影"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%9B%BB%E5%BD%B1&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非电影（页面不存在）">南非电影</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinema_of_South_Africa" title="en:Cinema of South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Cinema of South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>为数不多，但不少外国电影制作的内容都是关于南非。近年来，描绘得南非最引人注目的电影可以说是《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B9%9D%E7%A6%81%E5%8D%80" title="第九禁区">第九禁区</a>》<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-515"><a href="#cite_note-515">[501]</a></sup>。其他值得注意的电影有《<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%BB%91%E5%B9%AB%E6%9A%B4%E5%BE%92" title="黑帮暴徒">黑帮暴徒</a>》，该电影在2005年的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC78%E5%B1%86%E5%A5%A7%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%E9%87%91%E5%83%8F%E7%8D%8E" title="第78届奥斯卡金像奖">第78届奥斯卡颁奖典礼</a>上获得<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A7%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%B3%E5%A4%96%E8%AA%9E%E7%89%87%E7%8D%8E" title="奥斯卡最佳外语片奖">奥斯卡最佳外语片奖</a>，至于《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="U-Carmen eKhayelitsha" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="卡雅利沙的卡门"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E9%9B%85%E5%88%A9%E6%B2%99%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%A1%E9%96%80&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="卡雅利沙的卡门（页面不存在）">卡雅利沙的卡门</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U-Carmen_eKhayelitsha" title="en:U-Carmen eKhayelitsha"><span dir="auto" lang="en">U-Carmen eKhayelitsha</span></a></span>）</span></span>》亦在2005年<a href="/wiki/%E6%9F%8F%E6%9E%97%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%94%B5%E5%BD%B1%E8%8A%82" title="柏林国际电影节">柏林国际电影节</a>上获得<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%87%91%E7%86%8A%E7%8D%8E" title="金熊奖">金熊奖</a>。2015年，<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Oliver Hermanus" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="奥利维·赫曼努斯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E8%B5%AB%E6%9B%BC%E5%8A%AA%E6%96%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="奥利维·赫曼努斯（页面不存在）">奥利维·赫曼努斯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oliver_Hermanus" title="en:Oliver Hermanus"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Oliver Hermanus</span></a></span>）</span></span>的电影《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Endless River (film)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="无尽河"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%84%A1%E7%9B%A1%E6%B2%B3&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="无尽河（页面不存在）">无尽河</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Endless_River_(film)" title="en:The Endless River (film)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Endless River (film)</span></a></span>）</span></span>》成为首部入选<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%A8%81%E5%B0%BC%E6%96%AF%E9%9B%BB%E5%BD%B1%E7%AF%80" title="威尼斯电影节">威尼斯电影节</a>的南非电影。
</p>
<h3><span id=".E9.A3.B2.E9.A3.9F"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="饮食">饮食</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=42" title="编辑章节：饮食">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African cuisine" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非饮食"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%A3%B2%E9%A3%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非饮食（页面不存在）">南非饮食</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_cuisine" title="en:South African cuisine"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African cuisine</span></a></span>）</span></span>和<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African wine" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非葡萄酒"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E9%85%92&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非葡萄酒（页面不存在）">南非葡萄酒</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_wine" title="en:South African wine"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African wine</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="300" data-file-width="400" decoding="async" height="165" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/70/Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg/220px-Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/70/Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg/330px-Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/70/Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Quarter_Mutton_Bunny_Chow.jpg" title="放大"></a></div>德班的特色菜肴——<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E4%B8%89%E6%98%8E%E6%B2%BB" title="南非三明治">南非三明治</a>，这道菜起源于当地的印度裔社区。</div></div></div>
<p><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African cuisine" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非饮食"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%A3%B2%E9%A3%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非饮食（页面不存在）">南非饮食</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_cuisine" title="en:South African cuisine"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African cuisine</span></a></span>）</span></span>相当多样化<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-newsmodia50306_516-0"><a href="#cite_note-newsmodia50306-516">[502]</a></sup>。所有人都喜欢来自不同文化的食物，尤其是那些希望品尝各种南非美食的游客<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-newsmodia50306_516-1"><a href="#cite_note-newsmodia50306-516">[502]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非的<a href="/wiki/%E8%8F%9C%E9%A4%9A" title="菜肴">菜肴</a>与饮食文化大多以<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%82%89%E9%A1%9E" title="肉类">肉类</a>为基础，并形成了南非特色的社交聚会形式，当地人称之为“布莱”（Braai，意为烤肉或烧烤）<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-517"><a href="#cite_note-517">[503]</a></sup>。现时，南非已经发展为主要的<a href="/wiki/%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E9%85%92" title="葡萄酒">葡萄酒</a>生产国之一，于葡萄酒制造业上亦颇具名气；在<a href="/wiki/%E6%96%AF%E6%B3%B0%E5%80%AB%E5%8D%9A%E6%96%AF" title="斯泰伦博斯">斯泰伦博斯</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Franschhoek" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="弗朗斯胡克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E6%96%AF%E8%83%A1%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="弗朗斯胡克（页面不存在）">弗朗斯胡克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franschhoek" title="en:Franschhoek"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Franschhoek</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%95%E9%98%BF%E7%88%BE" title="帕阿尔">帕阿尔</a>以及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Barrydale" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="巴里代尔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B7%B4%E9%87%8C%E4%BB%A3%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="巴里代尔（页面不存在）">巴里代尔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barrydale" title="en:Barrydale"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Barrydale</span></a></span>）</span></span>的山谷中，诸多上好的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E5%9C%92" title="葡萄园">葡萄园</a>驰名世界<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-518"><a href="#cite_note-518">[504]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h3><span id=".E9.AB.94.E8.82.B2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="体育">体育</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=43" title="编辑章节：体育">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Sport in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非体育"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%AB%94%E8%82%B2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非体育（页面不存在）">南非体育</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sport_in_South_Africa" title="en:Sport in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Sport in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Springbok_parade.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="375" data-file-width="500" decoding="async" height="165" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/Springbok_parade.jpg/220px-Springbok_parade.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/Springbok_parade.jpg/330px-Springbok_parade.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/Springbok_parade.jpg/440px-Springbok_parade.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Springbok_parade.jpg" title="放大"></a></div>在赢得<a href="/wiki/2007%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83%E6%A9%84%E6%AC%96%E7%90%83%E8%B3%BD" title="2007年世界杯橄揽球赛">2007年世界杯橄揽球赛</a>后，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%B7%B3%E7%BE%9A%E9%9A%8A" title="跳羚队">跳羚队</a>参加巴士巡游。</div></div></div>
<p>南非最受欢迎与流行的体育运动为<a href="/wiki/%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83" title="足球">足球</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%A9%84%E6%AC%96%E7%90%83" title="橄揽球">橄揽球</a>及<a href="/wiki/%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83" title="板球">板球</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-southafricasport_519-0"><a href="#cite_note-southafricasport-519">[505]</a></sup>。其他有显着关注与支持度的运动包括<a href="/wiki/%E6%B8%B8%E6%B3%B3" title="游泳">游泳</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%94%B0%E5%BE%91" title="田径">田径</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E7%88%BE%E5%A4%AB" title="高尔夫">高尔夫</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%8B%B3%E6%93%8A" title="拳击">拳击</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B6%B2%E7%90%83" title="网球">网球</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Ringball" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="无板球"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%84%A1%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="无板球（页面不存在）">无板球</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ringball" title="en:Ringball"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Ringball</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<a href="/wiki/%E7%B1%83%E7%B6%B2%E7%90%83" title="篮网球">篮网球</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-southafricasport_519-1"><a href="#cite_note-southafricasport-519">[505]</a></sup>。虽然足球在青少年中最受欢迎，但<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B1%83%E7%90%83" title="篮球">篮球</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%A1%9D%E6%B5%AA" title="冲浪">冲浪</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%BB%91%E6%9D%BF" title="滑板">滑板</a>等其他运动的支持度亦持续上升，并越来越受欢迎<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-southafricasport_519-2"><a href="#cite_note-southafricasport-519">[505]</a></sup>。
</p><p>曾为国外主要<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E4%BF%B1%E6%A8%82%E9%83%A8" title="足球俱乐部">足球俱乐部</a>效力的南非足球运动员包括<a href="/wiki/%E5%8F%B2%E8%92%82%E6%96%87%C2%B7%E7%9A%AE%E7%BA%B3%E5%B0%94" title="史蒂文·皮纳尔">史蒂文·皮纳尔</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E7%9B%A7%E5%8D%A1%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%8B%89%E8%BF%AA%E6%AF%94" title="卢卡斯·拉迪比">卢卡斯·拉迪比</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Philemon Masinga" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="菲尔·马辛加"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%8F%B2%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E8%BE%9B%E5%8A%A0&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="菲尔·马辛加（页面不存在）">菲尔·马辛加</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philemon_Masinga" title="en:Philemon Masinga"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Philemon Masinga</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%9C%AC%E5%B0%BC%C2%B7%E9%BA%A6%E5%8D%A1%E9%94%A1" title="本尼·麦卡锡">本尼·麦卡锡</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E9%9A%86%C2%B7%E8%8E%AB%E7%A7%91%E7%BA%B3" title="阿隆·莫科纳">阿隆·莫科纳</a>以及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Delron Buckley" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="德尔罗·巴克利"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BE%B7%E7%88%BE%E7%BE%85%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E5%85%8B%E5%88%A9&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="德尔罗·巴克利（页面不存在）">德尔罗·巴克利</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Delron_Buckley" title="en:Delron Buckley"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Delron Buckley</span></a></span>）</span></span>。南非曾举办<a href="/wiki/2010%E5%B9%B4%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%B6%B3%E5%8D%94%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83" title="2010年国际足协世界杯">2010年国际足协世界杯</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-520"><a href="#cite_note-520">[506]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-521"><a href="#cite_note-521">[507]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-522"><a href="#cite_note-522">[508]</a></sup>，国际足联主席<a href="/wiki/%E5%A1%9E%E6%99%AE%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E6%8B%89%E7%89%B9" title="塞普·布拉特">塞普·布拉特</a>因南非成功举办世界杯而将其评为9分（满分10分）<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-523"><a href="#cite_note-523">[509]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非着名的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%8B%B3%E6%93%8A" title="拳击">拳击</a>选手包括“小杰克”<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jacob Matlala" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="雅各布·马特拉"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%9B%85%E5%90%84%E5%B8%83%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E7%89%B9%E6%8B%89&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="雅各布·马特拉（页面不存在）">雅各布·马特拉</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacob_Matlala" title="en:Jacob Matlala"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jacob Matlala</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Vuyani Bungu" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="武亚尼·邦古"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E4%BA%9E%E5%B0%BC%C2%B7%E9%82%A6%E5%8F%A4&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="武亚尼·邦古（页面不存在）">武亚尼·邦古</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vuyani_Bungu" title="en:Vuyani Bungu"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Vuyani Bungu</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Welcome Ncita" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="韦尔科姆·西塔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%9F%8B%E7%88%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E8%A5%BF%E5%A1%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="韦尔科姆·西塔（页面不存在）">韦尔科姆·西塔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welcome_Ncita" title="en:Welcome Ncita"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Welcome Ncita</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Dingaan Thobela" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="迪加恩·托贝拉"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%BF%AA%E5%8A%A0%E6%81%A9%C2%B7%E6%89%98%E8%B2%9D%E6%8B%89&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="迪加恩·托贝拉（页面不存在）">迪加恩·托贝拉</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dingaan_Thobela" title="en:Dingaan Thobela"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Dingaan Thobela</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Gerrie Coetzee" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="格里·科策"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%A0%BC%E9%87%8C%C2%B7%E7%A7%91%E7%AD%96&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="格里·科策（页面不存在）">格里·科策</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerrie_Coetzee" title="en:Gerrie Coetzee"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Gerrie Coetzee</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Brian Mitchell (boxer)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="布赖恩·米切尔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83%E8%B3%B4%E6%81%A9%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%88%87%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="布赖恩·米切尔（页面不存在）">布赖恩·米切尔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Mitchell_(boxer)" title="en:Brian Mitchell (boxer)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Brian Mitchell (boxer)</span></a></span>）</span></span>。2010年，德班<a href="/wiki/%E8%A1%9D%E6%B5%AA" title="冲浪">冲浪</a>选手<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jordy Smith" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="乔迪·史密斯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E8%BF%AA%C2%B7%E5%8F%B2%E5%AF%86%E6%96%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="乔迪·史密斯（页面不存在）">乔迪·史密斯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jordy_Smith" title="en:Jordy Smith"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jordy Smith</span></a></span>）</span></span>赢得<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="J-Bay Open" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="杰弗里斯贝湾公开赛"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%82%91%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%E8%B2%9D%E7%81%A3%E5%85%AC%E9%96%8B%E8%B3%BD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="杰弗里斯贝湾公开赛（页面不存在）">杰弗里斯贝湾公开赛</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J-Bay_Open" title="en:J-Bay Open"><span dir="auto" lang="en">J-Bay Open</span></a></span>）</span></span>，成为世界排名第一的冲浪选手。此外，南非是1979年<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%B8%80%E7%B4%9A%E6%96%B9%E7%A8%8B%E5%BC%8F%E8%B3%BD%E8%BB%8A" title="一级方程式赛车">一级方程式赛车</a>世界冠军<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%9C%B1%E8%BF%AA%C2%B7%E8%B0%A2%E7%A7%91%E7%89%B9" title="朱迪·谢科特">朱迪·谢科特</a>的诞生地。南非当前着名的<a href="/wiki/%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83" title="板球">板球</a>运动员包括<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="AB de Villiers" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="亚伯拉罕·本杰明·德·维里埃"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BA%9E%E4%BC%AF%E6%8B%89%E7%BD%95%C2%B7%E6%9C%AC%E5%82%91%E6%98%8E%C2%B7%E5%BE%B7%C2%B7%E7%B6%AD%E9%87%8C%E5%9F%83&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="亚伯拉罕·本杰明·德·维里埃（页面不存在）">亚伯拉罕·本杰明·德·维里埃</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AB_de_Villiers" title="en:AB de Villiers"><span dir="auto" lang="en">AB de Villiers</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Hashim Amla" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="哈希姆·阿姆拉"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%93%88%E5%B8%8C%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%86%E6%8B%89&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="哈希姆·阿姆拉（页面不存在）">哈希姆·阿姆拉</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hashim_Amla" title="en:Hashim Amla"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Hashim Amla</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Dale Steyn" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="戴尔·斯泰恩"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%88%B4%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E6%96%AF%E6%B3%B0%E6%81%A9&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="戴尔·斯泰恩（页面不存在）">戴尔·斯泰恩</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dale_Steyn" title="en:Dale Steyn"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Dale Steyn</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Vernon Philander" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="弗农·菲兰德"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BC%97%E8%BE%B2%C2%B7%E8%8F%B2%E8%98%AD%E5%BE%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="弗农·菲兰德（页面不存在）">弗农·菲兰德</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vernon_Philander" title="en:Vernon Philander"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Vernon Philander</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Faf du Plessis" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="法·杜·普莱西斯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%95%C2%B7%E6%9D%9C%C2%B7%E6%99%AE%E8%90%8A%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="法·杜·普莱西斯（页面不存在）">法·杜·普莱西斯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faf_du_Plessis" title="en:Faf du Plessis"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Faf du Plessis</span></a></span>）</span></span>等，他们大多也参加了<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E8%B6%85%E7%B4%9A%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83%E8%81%AF%E8%B3%BD" title="印度超级板球联赛">印度超级板球联赛</a>。
</p><p>除此以外，南非还是许多世界级橄揽球运动员的诞生地，例如<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E7%B4%A2%E7%93%A6%C2%B7%E7%9A%AE%E7%B4%8D%E7%88%BE" title="弗朗索瓦·皮纳尔">弗朗索瓦·皮纳尔</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Joost van der Westhuizen" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="乔斯特·凡·德·韦斯特岑"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E6%96%AF%E7%89%B9%C2%B7%E5%87%A1%C2%B7%E5%BE%B7%C2%B7%E9%9F%8B%E6%96%AF%E7%89%B9%E5%B2%91&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="乔斯特·凡·德·韦斯特岑（页面不存在）">乔斯特·凡·德·韦斯特岑</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joost_van_der_Westhuizen" title="en:Joost van der Westhuizen"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Joost van der Westhuizen</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Danie Craven" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="丹尼·克雷文"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B9%E5%B0%BC%C2%B7%E5%85%8B%E9%9B%B7%E6%96%87&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="丹尼·克雷文（页面不存在）">丹尼·克雷文</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danie_Craven" title="en:Danie Craven"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Danie Craven</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Frik du Preez" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="弗里克·杜·布里兹"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E6%9D%9C%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E9%87%8C%E8%8C%B2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="弗里克·杜·布里兹（页面不存在）">弗里克·杜·布里兹</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frik_du_Preez" title="en:Frik du Preez"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Frik du Preez</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Naas Botha" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="纳斯·博塔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%8D%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%8D%9A%E5%A1%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="纳斯·博塔（页面不存在）">纳斯·博塔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naas_Botha" title="en:Naas Botha"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Naas Botha</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E8%90%8A%E6%81%A9%C2%B7%E5%93%88%E5%B7%B4%E9%82%A3" title="布莱恩·哈巴那">布莱恩·哈巴那</a>。南非曾主办并赢得<a href="/wiki/1995%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83%E6%A9%84%E6%AC%96%E7%90%83%E8%B3%BD" title="1995年世界杯橄揽球赛">1995年世界杯橄揽球赛</a>冠军<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-524"><a href="#cite_note-524">[510]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-525"><a href="#cite_note-525">[511]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-526"><a href="#cite_note-526">[512]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-527"><a href="#cite_note-527">[513]</a></sup>，并于法国赢得<a href="/wiki/2007%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83%E6%A9%84%E6%AC%96%E7%90%83%E8%B3%BD" title="2007年世界杯橄揽球赛">2007年世界杯橄揽球赛</a>。在1995年世界杯橄揽球赛后，南非还主办了<a href="/wiki/1996%E5%B9%B4%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E7%9B%83" title="1996年非洲国家杯">1996年非洲国家杯</a>，而<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E9%9A%8A" title="南非国家足球队">国家队</a>亦再次胜出。南非还举办了<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="2003 Cricket World Cup" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="2003年世界杯板球赛"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=2003%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83%E8%B3%BD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="2003年世界杯板球赛（页面不存在）">2003年世界杯板球赛</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2003_Cricket_World_Cup" title="en:2003 Cricket World Cup"><span dir="auto" lang="en">2003 Cricket World Cup</span></a></span>）</span></span>与<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="ICC World Twenty20" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="2007年世界T20板球锦标赛"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=2007%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8CT20%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83%E9%8C%A6%E6%A8%99%E8%B3%BD&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="2007年世界T20板球锦标赛（页面不存在）">2007年世界T20板球锦标赛</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ICC_World_Twenty20" title="en:ICC World Twenty20"><span dir="auto" lang="en">ICC World Twenty20</span></a></span>）</span></span>。在<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="1998 ICC KnockOut Trophy" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="1998年国际板球协会淘汰杯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=1998%E5%B9%B4%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83%E5%8D%94%E6%9C%83%E6%B7%98%E6%B1%B0%E7%9B%83&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="1998年国际板球协会淘汰杯（页面不存在）">1998年国际板球协会淘汰杯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998_ICC_KnockOut_Trophy" title="en:1998 ICC KnockOut Trophy"><span dir="auto" lang="en">1998 ICC KnockOut Trophy</span></a></span>）</span></span>决赛中，南非击败了<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="West Indies cricket team" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="西印度群岛板球队"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%A5%BF%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E7%BE%A4%E5%B3%B6%E6%9D%BF%E7%90%83%E9%9A%8A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="西印度群岛板球队（页面不存在）">西印度群岛</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/West_Indies_cricket_team" title="en:West Indies cricket team"><span dir="auto" lang="en">West Indies cricket team</span></a></span>）</span></span>，赢得首届比赛的冠军。1998年的首届世界杯盲人板球赛中，南非队亦赢得冠军。
</p><p>2004年，<a href="/wiki/%E7%BD%97%E5%85%B0%C2%B7%E6%96%AF%E5%BA%93%E6%9B%BC" title="罗兰·斯库曼">罗兰·斯库曼</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%9E%97%E7%99%BB%C2%B7%E5%BC%97%E6%81%A9%E6%96%AF" title="林登·弗恩斯">林登·弗恩斯</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%BE%BE%E9%87%8C%E5%AE%89%C2%B7%E6%B1%A4%E6%A3%AE" title="达里安·汤森">达里安·汤森</a>以及<a href="/wiki/%E9%87%8C%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E5%86%85%E7%89%B9%E6%9E%97" title="里克·内特林">里克·内特林</a>的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/2004%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A7%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E5%9C%98" title="2004年夏季奥林匹克运动会南非代表团">游泳队</a>赢得<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/2004%E5%B9%B4%E9%9B%85%E5%85%B8%E5%A5%A7%E9%81%8B%E6%9C%83" title="2004年雅典奥运会">2004年雅典奥运会</a>的<a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A7%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83%E7%8D%8E%E7%89%8C" title="奥林匹克运动会奖牌">金牌</a>，同时打破了4×100<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%87%AA%E7%94%B1%E5%BC%8F" title="自由式">自由式</a>接力赛的世界纪录<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-528"><a href="#cite_note-528">[514]</a></sup>。<a href="/wiki/%E5%BD%AD%E5%A6%AE%C2%B7%E6%B5%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%96%AF" title="彭妮·海恩斯">彭妮·海恩斯</a>在<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/1996%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%9A%E7%89%B9%E5%85%B0%E5%A4%A7%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E4%BC%9A" title="1996年亚特兰大奥运会">1996年亚特兰大奥运会</a>上赢得金牌。2012年，<a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A7%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%C2%B7%E7%9A%AE%E6%96%AF%E6%89%98%E5%88%A9%E6%96%AF" title="奥斯卡·皮斯托利斯">奥斯卡·皮斯托利斯</a>成为首位参加<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/2012%E5%B9%B4%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E4%BC%9A" title="2012年伦敦奥运会">2012年伦敦奥运会</a>的双截肢短跑运动员<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-529"><a href="#cite_note-529">[515]</a></sup>。在<a href="/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E7%88%BE%E5%A4%AB%E7%90%83" title="高尔夫球">高尔夫球</a>方面，<a href="/wiki/%E8%93%8B%E7%91%9E%C2%B7%E6%99%AE%E8%90%8A%E7%88%BE" title="盖瑞·普莱尔">盖瑞·普莱尔</a>赢得多次<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E7%88%BE%E5%A4%AB%E7%90%83%E5%A4%A7%E6%BB%BF%E8%B2%AB" title="高尔夫球大满贯">职业大满贯</a>赛事，是有史以来最伟大的高尔夫球手之一，亦是南非五位着名高尔夫球手之一。其他赢得重大比赛的南非高尔夫球手包括<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Bobby Locke" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="鲍比·洛克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%AE%91%E6%AF%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="鲍比·洛克（页面不存在）">鲍比·洛克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Locke" title="en:Bobby Locke"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Bobby Locke</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8E%84%E5%B0%BC%C2%B7%E8%89%BE%E7%88%BE%E6%96%AF" title="厄尼·艾尔斯">厄尼·艾尔斯</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%B7%E8%92%82%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E5%8F%A4%E6%A3%AE" title="雷蒂夫·古森">雷蒂夫·古森</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Tim Clark (golfer)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="提姆·克拉克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%8F%90%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E5%85%8B%E6%8B%89%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="提姆·克拉克（页面不存在）">提姆·克拉克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Clark_(golfer)" title="en:Tim Clark (golfer)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Tim Clark (golfer)</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E7%89%B9%E9%9B%B7%E5%BC%97%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%E6%A2%85%E7%88%BE%E6%9B%BC" title="特雷弗·伊梅尔曼">特雷弗·伊梅尔曼</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Louis Oosthuizen" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="路易斯·乌修仁"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E7%83%8F%E4%BF%AE%E4%BB%81&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="路易斯·乌修仁（页面不存在）">路易斯·乌修仁</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Oosthuizen" title="en:Louis Oosthuizen"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Louis Oosthuizen</span></a></span>）</span></span>以及<a href="/wiki/%E6%9F%A5%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E8%88%92%E7%93%A6%E7%89%B9%E6%BE%A4%E7%88%BE" title="查尔·舒瓦特泽尔">查尔·舒瓦特泽尔</a>。
</p><p>南非在大型国际运动会的成绩：
</p>
<ul><li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E4%BC%9A" title="夏季奥运会">夏季奥运会</a>：26金 31银 29铜 86枚奖牌（非洲第2，世界第32）</li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%86%AC%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A7%E9%81%8B%E6%9C%83" title="冬季奥运会">冬季奥运会</a>：0金 0银 0铜 0枚奖牌（没有名次）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83" title="世界运动会">世界运动会</a>：6金 11银 18铜 35枚奖牌（非洲第2，世界第35）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83#夏季世界大学运动会" title="世界大学运动会">夏季大运会</a>：27金 21银 28铜 76枚奖牌（非洲第1，世界第27）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83#冬季世界大学运动会" title="世界大学运动会">冬季大运会</a>：0金 0银 0铜 0枚奖牌（没有名次）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E6%AD%A6%E6%90%8F%E9%81%8B%E5%8B%95%E6%9C%83" title="世界武搏运动会">世界武搏运动会</a>：2金 1银 8铜 11枚奖牌（非洲第2，世界第26）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="青年奥林匹克运动会">夏季青年奥运会</a>：6金 5银 4铜 15枚奖牌（非洲第4，世界第27）</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="青年奥林匹克运动会">冬季青年奥运会</a>：0金 0银 0铜 0枚奖牌（没有名次）</li></ul>
<h3><span id=".E5.9C.8B.E5.AE.B6.E8.B1.A1.E5.BE.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="国家象征">国家象征</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=44" title="编辑章节：国家象征">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r70089473/mw-parser-output/.tmulti" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="thumb tmulti tnone center"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:885px;max-width:885px"><div class="trow"><div class="theader">南非国家象征<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-530"><a href="#cite_note-530">[516]</a></sup></div></div><div class="trow"><div class="tsingle" style="width:175px;max-width:175px"><div class="thumbimage"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Protea_P1010883.JPG"><img alt="" data-file-height="2448" data-file-width="3264" title="帝王花">帝王花</a>，南非<a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E8%8A%B1" title="国花">国花</a></div></div><div class="tsingle" style="width:175px;max-width:175px"><div class="thumbimage"><a class="image" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0f/Podocarpus_latifolius_2c.JPG/260px-Podocarpus_latifolius_2c.JPG 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0f/Podocarpus_latifolius_2c.JPG/346px-Podocarpus_latifolius_2c.JPG 2x" width="173"/></a></div><div class="thumbcaption"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Podocarpus latifolius" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="黄木"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%BB%83%E6%9C%A8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="黄木（页面不存在）">黄木</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Podocarpus_latifolius" title="en:Podocarpus latifolius"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Podocarpus latifolius</span></a></span>）</span></span>，南非<a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%8B%E6%A8%B9" title="国树">国树</a></div></div><div class="tsingle" style="width:175px;max-width:175px"><div class="thumbimage"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Blue_Crane.jpg"><img alt="" data-file-height="1536" data-file-width="2048" decoding="async" height="130" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c8/Blue_Crane.jpg/173px-Blue_Crane.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c8/Blue_Crane.jpg/260px-Blue_Crane.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c8/Blue_Crane.jpg/346px-Blue_Crane.jpg 2x" width="173"/></a></div><div class="thumbcaption"><a href="/wiki/%E8%97%8D%E9%B6%B4" title="蓝鹤">蓝鹤</a>，南非<a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%8B%E9%B3%A5" title="国鸟">国鸟</a></div></div><div class="tsingle" style="width:175px;max-width:175px"><div class="thumbimage"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Springbok_etosha.jpg"><img alt="" data-file-height="370" data-file-width="500" decoding="async" height="128" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/Springbok_etosha.jpg/173px-Springbok_etosha.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/Springbok_etosha.jpg/260px-Springbok_etosha.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/Springbok_etosha.jpg/346px-Springbok_etosha.jpg 2x" width="173"/></a></div><div class="thumbcaption"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%B3%E7%BE%9A" title="跳羚">跳羚</a>，南非的象征动物</div></div><div class="tsingle" style="width:175px;max-width:175px"><div class="thumbimage"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Dichistius_capensis.JPG"><img alt="" data-file-height="225" data-file-width="300" decoding="async" height="130" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/15/Dichistius_capensis.JPG/173px-Dichistius_capensis.JPG" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/15/Dichistius_capensis.JPG/260px-Dichistius_capensis.JPG 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/15/Dichistius_capensis.JPG 2x" width="173"/></a></div><div class="thumbcaption"><a href="/wiki/%E5%AE%89%E5%93%A5%E6%8B%89%E9%9B%99%E5%B8%86%E9%AD%9A" title="安哥拉双帆鱼">安哥拉双帆鱼</a>，南非国鱼</div></div></div></div></div>
<h3><span id=".E7.AF.80.E6.97.A5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="节日">节日</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=45" title="编辑章节：节日">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Public holidays in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非公众假期"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%85%AC%E7%9C%BE%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非公众假期（页面不存在）">南非公众假期</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Public_holidays_in_South_Africa" title="en:Public holidays in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Public holidays in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<p>最新的南非全国年节及纪念日假期如下<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-fmprcgov678286_15-15"><a href="#cite_note-fmprcgov678286-15">[12]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-holidays_531-0"><a href="#cite_note-holidays-531">[517]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-nanfei899_532-0"><a href="#cite_note-nanfei899-532">[518]</a></sup>：
</p>

<h2><span id=".E6.95.99.E8.82.B2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="教育">教育</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=46" title="编辑章节：教育">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">主条目：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Education in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非教育"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非教育（页面不存在）">南非教育</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Education_in_South_Africa" title="en:Education in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Education in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="747" data-file-width="1000" decoding="async" height="164" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg/220px-Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg/330px-Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/60/Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg/440px-Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Mitchells-plain-schoolkids.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Mitchells Plain" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="米切尔平原"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B1%B3%E5%88%87%E7%88%BE%E5%B9%B3%E5%8E%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="米切尔平原（页面不存在）">米切尔平原</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mitchells_Plain" title="en:Mitchells Plain"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Mitchells Plain</span></a></span>）</span></span>的学童。</div></div></div>
<p>南非在近代曾经受到英国的殖民统治，包括<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%88%B6%E5%BA%A6" title="教育制度">教育制度</a>在内的社会运作模式几乎都是仿照英国的模式，像是被英国打上烙印般。因此，南非的教育基本上为<a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2" title="英国教育">英式教育</a>，甚至可以说与英国完全相同<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-nanfei86312_539-0"><a href="#cite_note-nanfei86312-539">[525]</a></sup>。
</p><p>由于南非曾实行种族隔离政策，早期的黑人几乎没有<a href="/wiki/%E5%8F%97%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E6%9D%83" title="受教育权">受教育的权力</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-540"><a href="#cite_note-540">[526]</a></sup>，更甭谈享受<a href="/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E7%AD%89%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2" title="高等教育">高等教育</a>。当时，南非的<a href="/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8" title="大学">大学</a>几乎全都是为白人开设的学校，直至废除种族隔离制度后，黑人才拥有<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%A9%9F%E6%9C%83%E5%B9%B3%E7%AD%89" title="机会平等">平等</a>受教育的权利。在这之后，南非还建立了一些专门为黑人而设的大学，例如<a href="/wiki/%E5%A4%B8%E7%A5%96%E9%B2%81-%E7%BA%B3%E5%A1%94%E5%B0%94%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6" title="夸祖鲁-纳塔尔大学">夸祖鲁-纳塔尔大学</a>等。
</p><p>2007年，南非15岁以上人口的<a href="/wiki/%E8%AD%98%E5%AD%97%E7%8E%87" title="识字率">识字率</a>为88.7%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-541"><a href="#cite_note-541">[527]</a></sup>，而到了2015年则上升至94.3%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-542"><a href="#cite_note-542">[528]</a></sup>，基本达到发达国家的识字率水平。南非从小学开始实行三级教育，之后是高中以及属高等教育的学术大学与技术大学。学习者须从1年级起就读至12年级，接受为期12年的正规学校教育。R级是<a href="/wiki/%E5%AD%B8%E5%89%8D%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2" title="学前教育">学前教育</a>的基础年<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-edufacts0831_543-0"><a href="#cite_note-edufacts0831-543">[529]</a></sup>。小学跨越了学校教育的前七年<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-544"><a href="#cite_note-544">[530]</a></sup>，至于后五年则为高中教育。在12年级结束时，学生会应考<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="National Senior Certificate" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="国家高级证书"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E9%AB%98%E7%B4%9A%E8%AD%89%E6%9B%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="国家高级证书（页面不存在）">国家高级证书</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Senior_Certificate" title="en:National Senior Certificate"><span dir="auto" lang="en">National Senior Certificate</span></a></span>）</span></span>考试，以决定能否升读<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="List of universities in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非大学列表"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非大学列表（页面不存在）">各大学</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_universities_in_South_Africa" title="en:List of universities in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">List of universities in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-edufacts0831_543-1"><a href="#cite_note-edufacts0831-543">[529]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非的公立大学分为三种<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-nanfei86312_539-1"><a href="#cite_note-nanfei86312-539">[525]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-52hrttD1489630756652_545-0"><a href="#cite_note-52hrttD1489630756652-545">[531]</a></sup>：分别是提供理论导向大学学位的传统大学、提供职业导向文凭与学位的<a class="mw-disambig" href="/wiki/%E6%8A%80%E8%A1%93%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8" title="技术大学">技术大学</a>（前称为理工大学）以及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B6%9C%E5%90%88%E6%80%A7%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8" title="綜合性大学">綜合性大学</a>，并分别提供两种类型的<a href="/wiki/%E5%B0%88%E6%A5%AD%E8%AA%8D%E8%AD%89" title="专业认证">专业认证</a>。截至2017年，南非有26所<a href="/wiki/%E5%85%AC%E7%AB%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8" title="公立大学">公立大学</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-52hrttD1489630756652_545-1"><a href="#cite_note-52hrttD1489630756652-545">[531]</a></sup>：11所为传统大学、6所为技术大学、9所为綜合性大学<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-52hrttD1489630756652_545-2"><a href="#cite_note-52hrttD1489630756652-545">[531]</a></sup>。
</p><p>在种族隔离制度下，黑人学校受到资金不足与单独的<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Bantu Education Act, 1953" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="1953年班图教育法"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=1953%E5%B9%B4%E7%8F%AD%E5%9C%96%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E6%B3%95&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="1953年班图教育法（页面不存在）">班图教育课程</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bantu_Education_Act,_1953" title="en:Bantu Education Act, 1953"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Bantu Education Act, 1953</span></a></span>）</span></span>的<a href="/wiki/%E6%AD%A7%E8%A6%96" title="歧视">歧视</a>，该课程的教学大纲只是为了给予他们足够的技能来作为一个劳动者<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-546"><a href="#cite_note-546">[532]</a></sup>。2004年，南非开始改革其高等教育体系：将小型大学合并并纳入更大的机构；并将所有高等教育机构改名为“大学”，以纠正这些不平衡。到了2015年，有140万高等教育学生受益于1999年颁布的财政援助计划<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-547"><a href="#cite_note-547">[533]</a></sup>。
</p><p>教育是南非最重要的关注领域之一<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-financesinabg0511159161_353-5"><a href="#cite_note-financesinabg0511159161-353">[342]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-548"><a href="#cite_note-548">[534]</a></sup>，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2" title="公共教育">公共教育</a>支出占2002年至2005年南非<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%9C%8B%E5%85%A7%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A2%E7%B8%BD%E5%80%BC" title="国内生产总值">国内生产总值</a>的5.4%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-549"><a href="#cite_note-549">[535]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h2><span id=".E9.86.AB.E7.99.82.E8.A1.9B.E7.94.9F"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="医疗卫生">医疗卫生</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=47" title="编辑章节：医疗卫生">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">主条目：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Health in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非医疗卫生"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%86%AB%E7%99%82%E8%A1%9B%E7%94%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非医疗卫生（页面不存在）">南非医疗卫生</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Health_in_South_Africa" title="en:Health in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Health in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>和<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Healthcare in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非医疗保健"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%86%AB%E7%99%82%E4%BF%9D%E5%81%A5&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非医疗保健（页面不存在）">南非医疗保健</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healthcare_in_South_Africa" title="en:Healthcare in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Healthcare in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:332px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="335" data-file-width="512" decoding="async" height="216" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg/330px-Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg/495px-Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg/660px-Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg.png 2x" width="330"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Life_expectancy_in_select_Southern_African_countries_1960-2012.svg" title="放大"></a></div>爱滋病影响寿命下降。</div></div></div>
<p>根据<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African Institute of Race Relations" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非种族关系研究所"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%A8%AE%E6%97%8F%E9%97%9C%E4%BF%82%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非种族关系研究所（页面不存在）">南非种族关系研究所</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_Institute_of_Race_Relations" title="en:South African Institute of Race Relations"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African Institute of Race Relations</span></a></span>）</span></span>的数据，2009年白人的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%A0%90%E6%9C%9F%E5%A3%BD%E5%91%BD" title="预期寿命">预期寿命</a>为71岁，而黑人则为48岁<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-550"><a href="#cite_note-550">[536]</a></sup>。南非的医疗保健支出约占GDP的9%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-smartpl_551-0"><a href="#cite_note-smartpl-551">[537]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-552"><a href="#cite_note-552">[538]</a></sup>。
</p><p>只有16%南非人受到<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Healthcare in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非医疗保健"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%86%AB%E7%99%82%E4%BF%9D%E5%81%A5&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非医疗保健（页面不存在）">医疗计划</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healthcare_in_South_Africa" title="en:Healthcare in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Healthcare in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>保障<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-553"><a href="#cite_note-553">[539]</a></sup>，约20%的人使用私人<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%86%AB%E7%99%82%E4%BF%9D%E5%81%A5" title="医疗保健">医疗保健</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-fmhealth_554-0"><a href="#cite_note-fmhealth-554">[540]</a></sup>。至于其余的人则需要<a href="/wiki/%E8%87%AA%E4%BB%98%E8%B2%BB%E7%94%A8" title="自付费用">自付费用</a>或通过医院现金计划来支付<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-fmhealth_554-1"><a href="#cite_note-fmhealth-554">[540]</a></sup>。三个主要的医院集团<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Mediclinic International" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Mediclinic"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Mediclinic&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Mediclinic（页面不存在）">Mediclinic</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mediclinic_International" title="en:Mediclinic International"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Mediclinic International</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="LIFE Healthcare Group" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="生命医疗集团"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%94%9F%E5%91%BD%E9%86%AB%E7%99%82%E9%9B%86%E5%9C%98&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="生命医疗集团（页面不存在）">生命医疗</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LIFE_Healthcare_Group" title="en:LIFE Healthcare Group"><span dir="auto" lang="en">LIFE Healthcare Group</span></a></span>）</span></span>及<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Netcare" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="尼特卫生"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%B0%BC%E7%89%B9%E8%A1%9B%E7%94%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="尼特卫生（页面不存在）">尼特卫生</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netcare" title="en:Netcare"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Netcare</span></a></span>）</span></span>合共控制着75%市场份额<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-fmhealth_554-2"><a href="#cite_note-fmhealth-554">[540]</a></sup>。大约84%人口依赖公共医疗系统<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-smartpl_551-1"><a href="#cite_note-smartpl-551">[537]</a></sup>，这系统受到长期人力资源短缺与资源有限所困扰<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-555"><a href="#cite_note-555">[541]</a></sup>。
</p><p>南非是世界第三大医院<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Chris Hani Baragwanath Hospital" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="克里斯·哈尼·巴拉瓦纳特医院"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%85%8B%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%93%88%E5%B0%BC%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E6%8B%89%E7%93%A6%E7%B4%8D%E7%89%B9%E9%86%AB%E9%99%A2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="克里斯·哈尼·巴拉瓦纳特医院（页面不存在）">克里斯·哈尼·巴拉瓦纳特医院</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Hani_Baragwanath_Hospital" title="en:Chris Hani Baragwanath Hospital"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Chris Hani Baragwanath Hospital</span></a></span>）</span></span>的所在地<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-556"><a href="#cite_note-556">[542]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h3><span id=".E4.BA.BA.E9.A1.9E.E5.85.8D.E7.96.AB.E7.BC.BA.E4.B9.8F.E7.97.85.E6.AF.92.EF.BC.8F.E6.84.9B.E6.BB.8B.E7.97.85"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病">人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=48" title="编辑章节：人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">参见：<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="HIV/AIDS in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非的人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E9%A1%9E%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E7%BC%BA%E4%B9%8F%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%EF%BC%8F%E6%84%9B%E6%BB%8B%E7%97%85&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非的人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病（页面不存在）">南非的人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HIV/AIDS_in_South_Africa" title="en:HIV/AIDS in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">HIV/AIDS in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span></div>
<p>南非是全球感染<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%84%9B%E6%BB%8B%E7%97%85" title="爱滋病">爱滋病</a>人口最多的国家<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-guancha232457_29-13"><a href="#cite_note-guancha232457-29">[25]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-people2487663_186-9"><a href="#cite_note-people2487663-186">[177]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-businessweeklyAIDS_557-0"><a href="#cite_note-businessweeklyAIDS-557">[543]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hkoncc20170801_558-0"><a href="#cite_note-hkoncc20170801-558">[544]</a></sup>。根据2015年<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%81%AF%E5%90%88%E5%9C%8B%E6%84%9B%E6%BB%8B%E7%97%85%E8%81%AF%E5%90%88%E8%A6%8F%E5%8A%83%E7%BD%B2" title="联合国爱滋病联合规划署">联合国爱滋病联合规划署</a>的报告，南非估计有700万爱滋病毒感染者<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hkoncc20170801_558-1"><a href="#cite_note-hkoncc20170801-558">[544]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-559"><a href="#cite_note-559">[545]</a></sup>。<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="HIV/AIDS in South Africa" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非的人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E9%A1%9E%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E7%BC%BA%E4%B9%8F%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%EF%BC%8F%E6%84%9B%E6%BB%8B%E7%97%85&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非的人类免疫缺乏病毒／爱滋病（页面不存在）">南非的爱滋病</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HIV/AIDS_in_South_Africa" title="en:HIV/AIDS in South Africa"><span dir="auto" lang="en">HIV/AIDS in South Africa</span></a></span>）</span></span>问题很严重<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-guancha232457_29-14"><a href="#cite_note-guancha232457-29">[25]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cn1n1752189564_33-12"><a href="#cite_note-cn1n1752189564-33">[29]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-people2487663_186-10"><a href="#cite_note-people2487663-186">[177]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-businessweeklyAIDS_557-1"><a href="#cite_note-businessweeklyAIDS-557">[543]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hkoncc20170801_558-2"><a href="#cite_note-hkoncc20170801-558">[544]</a></sup>，在2013年约有560万人（超过南非总人口的10%）感染了爱滋病毒<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-businessweeklyAIDS_557-2"><a href="#cite_note-businessweeklyAIDS-557">[543]</a></sup>。2008年的一项研究显示，南非不同种族在感染爱滋病毒方面有明显差异：有13.6%的黑人对爱滋病毒呈阳性，但只有0.3%的白人患有爱滋病<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-560"><a href="#cite_note-560">[546]</a></sup>。南非每年平均出现约30万宗爱滋病新增病例，而因爱滋病相关原因丧命的人亦达到27万<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-businessweeklyAIDS_557-3"><a href="#cite_note-businessweeklyAIDS-557">[543]</a></sup>。在2005年，南非估计分别有高达31%的<a href="/wiki/%E5%AD%95%E5%A9%A6" title="孕妇">孕妇</a>以及20%以上的<a href="/wiki/%E6%88%90%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%BA" title="成年人">成年人</a>感染了爱滋病毒<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-561"><a href="#cite_note-561">[547]</a></sup>。南非国民的爱滋病感染率为21.5%，至于军队中感染爱滋病病毒及爱滋病患者的比例更高达23%<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-562"><a href="#cite_note-562">[548]</a></sup>。
</p><p>前总统姆贝基及时任<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Minister of Health (South Africa)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="卫生部长 (南非)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%A1%9B%E7%94%9F%E9%83%A8%E9%95%B7_(%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="卫生部长 (南非)（页面不存在）">卫生部长</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minister_of_Health_(South_Africa)" title="en:Minister of Health (South Africa)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Minister of Health (South Africa)</span></a></span>）</span></span><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Manto Tshabalala-Msimang" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="曼托·沙巴拉拉-姆希曼"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%9B%BC%E6%89%98%C2%B7%E6%B2%99%E5%B7%B4%E6%8B%89%E6%8B%89-%E5%A7%86%E5%B8%8C%E6%9B%BC&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="曼托·沙巴拉拉-姆希曼（页面不存在）">曼托·沙巴拉拉-姆希曼</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manto_Tshabalala-Msimang" title="en:Manto Tshabalala-Msimang"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Manto Tshabalala-Msimang</span></a></span>）</span></span>长期否认南非爱滋病问题<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-stormmg143340_563-0"><a href="#cite_note-stormmg143340-563">[549]</a></sup>，他们都坚持认为，许多南非人的死亡是由于<a href="/wiki/%E7%87%9F%E9%A4%8A%E4%B8%8D%E8%89%AF" title="营养不良">营养不良</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-564"><a href="#cite_note-564">[550]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-565"><a href="#cite_note-565">[551]</a></sup>与<a href="/wiki/%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98" title="非洲贫困问题">贫困</a>问题，而不是爱滋病所致的<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-566"><a href="#cite_note-566">[552]</a></sup>。2007年起，为了应对国际压力，政府开始努力着手抗击爱滋病<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-567"><a href="#cite_note-567">[553]</a></sup>。
</p><p>在<a href="/wiki/2009%E5%B9%B4%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%A4%A7%E9%81%B8" title="2009年南非大选">2009年大选</a>之后，时任总统祖玛任命<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Aaron Motsoaledi" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="艾伦·莫茨尔莱迪"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%89%BE%E5%80%AB%C2%B7%E8%8E%AB%E8%8C%A8%E7%88%BE%E8%90%8A%E8%BF%AA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="艾伦·莫茨尔莱迪（页面不存在）">艾伦·莫茨尔莱迪</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aaron_Motsoaledi" title="en:Aaron Motsoaledi"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Aaron Motsoaledi</span></a></span>）</span></span>博士为新的卫生部长，并承诺他的政府将会增加资金以扩大爱滋病治疗的范围<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-568"><a href="#cite_note-568">[554]</a></sup>。直至2015年，南非已在爱滋病治疗方面取得重大进展<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-569"><a href="#cite_note-569">[555]</a></sup>，政府提供廉价有效的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%97%A5%E7%89%A9" title="药物">药物</a>，使预期寿命从52.1岁大幅增加到62.5岁<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-stormmg143340_563-1"><a href="#cite_note-stormmg143340-563">[549]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-570"><a href="#cite_note-570">[556]</a></sup>。
</p>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.83.E8.A6.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参见">参见</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=49" title="编辑章节：参见">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div aria-label="Portals" class="noprint portal plainlist tright" role="navigation" style="margin:0.5em 0 0.5em 1em;border:solid #aaa 1px">
<ul style="display:table;box-sizing:border-box;padding:0.1em;max-width:175px;background:#f9f9f9;font-size:85%;line-height:110%;font-weight:bold">
<li style="display:table-row"><span style="display:table-cell;padding:0.2em;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center"><img alt="icon" class="noviewer thumbborder" data-file-height="267" data-file-width="400" decoding="async" height="21" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/32px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/48px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/64px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" width="32"/></span><span style="display:table-cell;padding:0.2em 0.2em 0.2em 0.3em;vertical-align:middle"><a href="/wiki/Portal:%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E" title="Portal:南非">南非主题</a></span></li>
<li style="display:table-row"><span style="display:table-cell;padding:0.2em;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center"><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="1824" data-file-width="1624" decoding="async" height="28" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg/25px-Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg/37px-Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg/50px-Africa_satellite_orthographic.jpg 2x" width="25"/></span><span style="display:table-cell;padding:0.2em 0.2em 0.2em 0.3em;vertical-align:middle"><a href="/wiki/Portal:%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2" title="Portal:非洲">非洲主题</a></span></li></ul></div>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r64841240">.mw-parser-output .div-col{margin-top:0.3em;column-width:30em;column-count:2}.mw-parser-output .div-col-small{font-size:90%}.mw-parser-output .div-col-rules{column-rule:1px solid #aaa}.mw-parser-output .div-col dl,.mw-parser-output .div-col ol,.mw-parser-output .div-col ul{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .div-col li,.mw-parser-output .div-col dd{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}</style><div class="div-col" style="column-width:auto; column-count:2;">

<li><a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E9%9D%9E%E5%88%A9%E5%8D%A1%E4%BA%BA" title="阿非利卡人">阿非利卡人</a>（<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E7%88%BE%E4%BA%BA" title="布尔人">布尔人</a>）</li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E5%B8%83%E7%88%BE%E6%88%B0%E7%88%AD" title="第一次布尔战争">第一次布尔战争</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%AC%A1%E5%B8%83%E7%88%BE%E6%88%B0%E7%88%AD" title="第二次布尔战争">第二次布尔战争</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%A6%AC%E5%88%A9%E8%8C%B2%E5%8F%9B%E8%AE%8A" title="马利兹叛变">马利兹叛变</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%A8%AE%E6%97%8F%E9%9A%94%E9%9B%A2" title="南非种族隔离">南非种族隔离</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%B2%99%E4%BD%A9%E7%B6%AD%E7%88%BE%E5%B1%A0%E6%AE%BA" title="沙佩维尔屠杀">沙佩维尔屠杀</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%82%8A%E5%A2%83%E6%88%B0%E7%88%AD" title="南非边境战争">南非边境战争</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E7%AD%89%E6%94%B6%E5%85%A5%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1" title="中等收入陷阱">中等收入陷阱</a></li></ul>
</div>
<h2><span id=".E8.A8.BB.E9.87.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="注释">注释</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=50" title="编辑章节：注释">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div id="references-NoteFoot"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">或译为“不同的民族联合起来”。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Khoi languages" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="科尔语"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E5%B0%94%E8%AF%AD" title="科尔语">科尔语</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khoi_languages" title="en:Khoi languages"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Khoi languages</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%8D%E9%A6%AC%E8%AA%9E" title="纳马语">纳马语</a>与<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E4%BC%8A%E6%A1%91%E8%AA%9E%E7%B3%BB" title="科伊桑语系">科伊桑语系</a>语言、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="South African Sign Language" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="南非手语"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%89%8B%E8%AA%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="南非手语（页面不存在）">南非手语</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_African_Sign_Language" title="en:South African Sign Language"><span dir="auto" lang="en">South African Sign Language</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E8%AA%9E" title="德语">德语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B8%8C%E8%87%98%E8%AA%9E" title="希腊语">希腊语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8F%A4%E5%90%89%E6%8B%89%E7%89%B9%E8%AA%9E" title="古吉拉特语">古吉拉特语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%B0%E5%9C%B0%E8%AA%9E" title="印地语">印地语</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E7%89%99%E8%AA%9E" title="葡萄牙语">葡萄牙语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%9B%A7%E5%9B%BA%E8%AA%9E" title="泰卢固语">泰卢固语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%B1%B3%E7%88%BE%E8%AA%9E" title="泰米尔语">泰米尔语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%83%8F%E7%88%BE%E9%83%BD%E8%AA%9E" title="乌尔都语">乌尔都语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E6%8B%89%E4%BC%AF%E8%AA%9E" title="阿拉伯语">阿拉伯语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B8%8C%E4%BC%AF%E4%BE%86%E8%AA%9E" title="希伯来语">希伯来语</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%A2%B5%E8%AA%9E" title="梵语">梵语</a>以及其他在南非“用于宗教用途的语言”都具有特别地位（<a class="external text" href="http://www.constitutionalcourt.org.za/site/constitution/english-web/ch1.html" rel="nofollow">《南非宪法》第一章第六条</a>）。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-8"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-8">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">选举行政总统的议会制共和国家，由总统掌握实权。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-28"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-28">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">2017年，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%85%A7%E6%96%AF%E5%A0%A1" title="约翰内斯堡">约翰内斯堡</a>都会区总人口为13,100,000，超越了<a href="/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%A4%8F%E6%B2%99" title="金夏沙">金沙萨</a>－<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E6%8B%89%E6%9F%B4%E7%B6%AD%E7%88%BE" title="布拉柴维尔">布拉柴维尔</a>都会区的12,850,000人。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-42"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-42">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">在<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%98%87%E8%81%AF%E8%A7%A3%E9%AB%94" title="苏联解体">苏联解体</a>后，<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%99%BD%E4%BF%84%E7%BE%85%E6%96%AF" title="白俄罗斯">白俄罗斯</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%93%88%E8%96%A9%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6" title="哈萨克斯坦">哈萨克斯坦</a>及<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%83%8F%E5%85%8B%E8%98%AD" title="乌克兰">乌克兰</a>等前<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%98%87%E8%81%AF%E5%8A%A0%E7%9B%9F%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%8B" title="苏联加盟共和国">苏联加盟共和国</a>仍继续拥有核武器，其后这些国家都决定将领土内的核武器转移给<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BF%84%E7%BE%85%E6%96%AF" title="俄罗斯">俄罗斯</a>。但严格来说，这些前苏联加盟共和国的核武器是由<a href="/wiki/%E4%BF%84%E7%BE%85%E6%96%AF%E8%88%87%E5%A4%A7%E8%A6%8F%E6%A8%A1%E6%AE%BA%E5%82%B7%E6%80%A7%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8" title="俄罗斯与大规模杀伤性武器">苏联所研发</a>，而不是自行研发的，因此南非是唯一自行发展核武器后自愿摧毁核武器的国家。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-EconomicMiracle-72"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-EconomicMiracle_72-0"><sup><b>6.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-EconomicMiracle_72-1"><sup><b>6.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">另一说法为从1932年到1972年的40年间。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-107"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-107">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">也称为“自由公民”（Vrijburgers）。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-153"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-153">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">亦称为“班图家园”、“黑人家园”、“黑人国家”或简称“家园”。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-160"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-160">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">维沃尔德表示，考虑到南非的“荣耀与尊严”，南非应该在被<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E8%81%AF%E9%82%A6" title="英联邦">英联邦</a>禠夺其成员身份前自行退出。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-210"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-210">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">不包括<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%84%9B%E5%BE%B7%E8%8F%AF%E7%8E%8B%E5%AD%90%E7%BE%A4%E5%B3%B6" title="爱德华王子群岛">爱德华王子群岛</a>。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-266"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-266">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">成年人在私人空间使用或持有大麻不会有刑事责任，不过在公共场合使用或贩售大麻仍属违法。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-461"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-461">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">由于多数人属于非法入境，因此无法估计正确数字。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-469"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-469">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">以2017年及2018年的南非人口统计作例子：在<a class="external text" href="http://www.statssa.gov.za/publications/P0302/P03022017.pdf" rel="nofollow">2017年南非人口统计</a>中，白人比例占总人口8.0%，有4,493,500人；而在<a class="external text" href="http://www.statssa.gov.za/publications/P0302/P03022018.pdf" rel="nofollow">2018年南非人口统计</a>中，白人比例虽然下降至占总人口7.8%，但实际上人口则上升至4,520,100人。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-483"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-483">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">广义上亦包括由非洲人发起的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%95%99%E6%9C%83" title="教会">教会</a>。</span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.83.E8.80.83.E6.96.87.E7.8D.BB"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参考文献">参考文献</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=51" title="编辑章节：参考文献">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="reflist columns references-column-count references-column-count-4" style="-moz-column-count: 4; -webkit-column-count: 4; column-count: 4; list-style-type: decimal;">
<ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20171118192747/http://www.constitutionalcourt.org.za/site/theconstitution/thetext.htm" rel="nofollow">The Constitution</a>. Constitutional Court of South Africa.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2009年9月3日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.constitutionalcourt.org.za/site/theconstitution/thetext.htm" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2017年11月18日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=The+Constitution&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=Constitutional+Court+of+South+Africa&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.constitutionalcourt.org.za%2Fsite%2Ftheconstitution%2Fthetext.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-16"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-16">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation web"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Central_Intelligence_Agency" title="Central Intelligence Agency">Central Intelligence Agency</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/resources/the-world-factbook/geos/sf.html" rel="nofollow">South Africa</a>. <li id="cite_note-Lechini-51"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Lechini_51-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Gladys Lechini, <i>Middle Powers: IBSA and the New South-South Cooperation. NACLA Report on the Americas</i>, Vol. 40, No. 5 (2007): 28-33: 'Today, a new, more selective South-South cooperation has appeared, bringing some hope to the people of our regions. The trilateral alliance known as the India, Brazil, and South Africa Dialogue Forum, or IBSA, exemplifies the trend … The three member countries face the same problems and have similar interests. All three consider themselves "middle powers" and leaders of their respective regions, yet they have also been subject to pressures from 'Emerging Middle Powers' Soft Balancing Strategy: State and Perspective of the IBSA Dialogue Forum.<i> Hamburg: GIGA, 2007.</i></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-52"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-52">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Peter Vale, 'South Africa: Understanding the Upstairs and the Downstairs', in <i>Niche Diplomacy: Middle Powers After the Cold War</i>, edited by Andrew F. <li id="cite_note-57"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-57">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation journal">Cooper, Andrew F; Antkiewicz, Agata; Shaw, Timothy M.
