<li id="cite_note-Lynch2010-58"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Lynch2010_58-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">David A. Lynch. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=-MH-GEL425AC&amp;pg=PA51" rel="nofollow">Trade and Globalization: An Introduction to Regional Trade Agreements</a>. Rowman &amp; Littlefield. 2010年: 51 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2013年8月25日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0-7425-6689-7" title="Special:网络书源/978-0-7425-6689-7"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0-7425-6689-7</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131011173913/http://books.google.com/books?id=-MH-GEL425AC&amp;pg=PA51" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2013年10月11日）. <q>Southern Africa is home to the other of sub-Saharan Africa's regional powers: South Africa. South Africa is more than just a regional power; it is currently the most developed and economically powerful country in Africa, and now it is able to use that influence in Africa more than during the days of apartheid (white rule), when it was ostracised.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.au=David+A.+Lynch&amp;rft.btitle=Trade+and+Globalization%3A+An+Introduction+to+Regional+Trade+Agreements&amp;rft.date=2010&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-7425-6689-7&amp;rft.pages=51&amp;rft.pub=Rowman+%26+Littlefield&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D-MH-GEL425AC%26pg%3DPA51&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-The_United_States_and_the_Great_Powers-59"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-The_United_States_and_the_Great_Powers_59-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Buzan, Barry. The United States and the Great Powers. <li id="cite_note-61"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-61">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20061012033753/http://www.iss.co.za/Pubs/ASR/9No3/SAMiddlePower.html" rel="nofollow">www.iss.co.za</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2018年7月27日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.iss.co.za/Pubs/ASR/9No3/SAMiddlePower.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2006年10月12日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=www.iss.co.za&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.iss.co.za%2FPubs%2FASR%2F9No3%2FSAMiddlePower.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-62"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-62">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">"Southern Africa is home to the other of sub-Saharan Africa's regional powers: South Africa. South Africa is more than just a regional power; it is by far the most developed and economically powerful country in Africa, and now it is able to use that influence in Africa more than during the days of apartheid (white rule), when it was ostracized." See David Lynch, <i>Trade and Globalization</i> (Lanham, USA: Rowman &amp; Littlefield Publishers, 2010), p. 51.</span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-78"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-78">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Livermon, Xavier. Sounds in the City. <li id="cite_note-79"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-79">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140116135926/http://www.deafsa.co.za/mzansi_ditoloki/" rel="nofollow">Mzansi DiToloki</a>. <li id="cite_note-epochtimesn3009721-96"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-epochtimesn3009721_96-0"><sup><b>90.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-epochtimesn3009721_96-1"><sup><b>90.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-epochtimesn3009721_96-2"><sup><b>90.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-epochtimesn3009721_96-3"><sup><b>90.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-epochtimesn3009721_96-4"><sup><b>90.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://www.epochtimes.com/b5/10/8/29/n3009721.htm" rel="nofollow">组图：南非好望角 最危险航海地段</a>. 大纪元时报. 2010年8月31日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2018年10月20日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20181020140551/http://www.epochtimes.com/b5/10/8/29/n3009721.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2018年10月20日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=%E7%B5%84%E5%9C%96%EF%BC%9A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%A5%BD%E6%9C%9B%E8%A7%92+%E6%9C%80%E5%8D%B1%E9%9A%AA%E8%88%AA%E6%B5%B7%E5%9C%B0%E6%AE%B5&amp;rft.date=2010-08-31&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%A4%A7%E7%B4%80%E5%85%83%E6%99%82%E5%A0%B1&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.epochtimes.com%2Fb5%2F10%2F8%2F29%2Fn3009721.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-137"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-137">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">钱乘旦，陈晓律，潘兴明，陈祖洲着. 英国通史 第6卷 日落斜阳 20世纪英国 A HISTORY OF ENGILAD. 南京：江苏人民出版社. 2016.09: 341. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/7-214-17543-6" title="Special:网络书源/7-214-17543-6"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 7-214-17543-6</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.au=%E9%92%B1%E4%B9%98%E6%97%A6%EF%BC%8C%E9%99%88%E6%99%93%E5%BE%8B%EF%BC%8C%E6%BD%98%E5%85%B4%E6%98%8E%EF%BC%8C%E9%99%88%E7%A5%96%E6%B4%B2%E8%91%97&amp;rft.btitle=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E9%80%9A%E5%8F%B2+%E7%AC%AC6%E5%8D%B7+%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%E6%96%9C%E9%98%B3+20%E4%B8%96%E7%BA%AA%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD+A+HISTORY+OF+ENGILAD&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=7-214-17543-6&amp;rft.pages=341&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%EF%BC%9A%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span> <span class="error citation-comment" style="display:none;font-size:100%">请检查<code style="color:inherit; border:inherit; padding:inherit;">|date=</code>中的日期值 (<a href="/wiki/Help:%E5%BC%95%E6%96%87%E6%A0%BC%E5%BC%8F1%E9%94%99%E8%AF%AF#bad_date" title="Help:引文格式1错误">帮助</a>)</span></span>

<li id="cite_note-203"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-203">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www6.nhk.or.jp/special/detail/index.html?aid=20100606" rel="nofollow">アフリカンドリーム 第3回 移民パワーが未来を変える</a>. <li id="cite_note-infotaiwantrade1266457-239"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-infotaiwantrade1266457_239-0"><sup><b>229.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-infotaiwantrade1266457_239-1"><sup><b>229.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-infotaiwantrade1266457_239-2"><sup><b>229.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://info.taiwantrade.com/biznews/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E-%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%A4%8D%E7%89%A9%E7%A8%AE%E9%A1%9E%E7%B9%81%E5%A4%9A-%E8%91%97%E5%90%8D%E8%8D%89%E8%97%A5%E5%A4%96%E9%8A%B7%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83-1266457.html" rel="nofollow">南非：南非植物种类繁多 着名草药外销全球</a>. 台湾经贸网. 2009年12月16日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2018年10月21日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20181021111736/https://info.taiwantrade.com/biznews/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E-%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%A4%8D%E7%89%A9%E7%A8%AE%E9%A1%9E%E7%B9%81%E5%A4%9A-%E8%91%97%E5%90%8D%E8%8D%89%E8%97%A5%E5%A4%96%E9%8A%B7%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83-1266457.html" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2018年10月21日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%EF%BC%9A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E6%A4%8D%E7%89%A9%E7%A8%AE%E9%A1%9E%E7%B9%81%E5%A4%9A+%E8%91%97%E5%90%8D%E8%8D%89%E8%97%A5%E5%A4%96%E9%8A%B7%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83&amp;rft.date=2009-12-16&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8F%B0%E7%81%A3%E7%B6%93%E8%B2%BF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.taiwantrade.com%2Fbiznews%2F%25E5%258D%2597%25E9%259D%259E-%25E5%258D%2597%25E9%259D%259E%25E6%25A4%258D%25E7%2589%25A9%25E7%25A8%25AE%25E9%25A1%259E%25E7%25B9%2581%25E5%25A4%259A-%25E8%2591%2597%25E5%2590%258D%25E8%258D%2589%25E8%2597%25A5%25E5%25A4%2596%25E9%258A%25B7%25E5%2585%25A8%25E7%2590%2583-1266457.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-thenewslens60496-381"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-thenewslens60496_381-0"><sup><b>370.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-thenewslens60496_381-1"><sup><b>370.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-thenewslens60496_381-2"><sup><b>370.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://hk.thenewslens.com/article/60496" rel="nofollow">国家发展迟缓、企业却前景看好的南非，腾讯最大股东就在这里</a>. 关键评论网. 2017年2月1日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2019年1月10日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190110183845/https://hk.thenewslens.com/article/60496" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2019年1月10日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E7%99%BC%E5%B1%95%E9%81%B2%E7%B7%A9%E3%80%81%E4%BC%81%E6%A5%AD%E5%8D%BB%E5%89%8D%E6%99%AF%E7%9C%8B%E5%A5%BD%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%EF%BC%8C%E9%A8%B0%E8%A8%8A%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E8%82%A1%E6%9D%B1%E5%B0%B1%E5%9C%A8%E9%80%99%E8%A3%A1&amp;rft.date=2017-02-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E9%97%9C%E9%8D%B5%E8%A9%95%E8%AB%96%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fhk.thenewslens.com%2Farticle%2F60496&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-hkcnews12937-392"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-hkcnews12937_392-0"><sup><b>381.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-hkcnews12937_392-1"><sup><b>381.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-hkcnews12937_392-2"><sup><b>381.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-hkcnews12937_392-3"><sup><b>381.3</b></sup></a> <a <li id="cite_note-455"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-455">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www.hk01.com/%E5%8D%B3%E6%99%82%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B/159443/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E6%95%A6%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96-%E5%85%A8%E7%90%8311%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E7%BC%BA%E6%B0%B4%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F%E5%80%92%E6%95%B8-%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%A6%9C%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E5%90%8D" rel="nofollow">南非开普敦以外　全球11城市缺水危机倒数　北京榜上有名</a>. 香港01. 2018年2月12日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2018年7月11日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20180711192357/https://www.hk01.com/%E5%8D%B3%E6%99%82%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B/159443/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E6%95%A6%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96-%E5%85%A8%E7%90%8311%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E7%BC%BA%E6%B0%B4%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F%E5%80%92%E6%95%B8-%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%A6%9C%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E5%90%8D" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2018年7月11日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E9%96%8B%E6%99%AE%E6%95%A6%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E3%80%80%E5%85%A8%E7%90%8311%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E7%BC%BA%E6%B0%B4%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F%E5%80%92%E6%95%B8%E3%80%80%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%A6%9C%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E5%90%8D&amp;rft.date=2018-02-12&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF01&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hk01.com%2F%25E5%258D%25B3%25E6%2599%2582%25E5%259C%258B%25E9%259A%259B%2F159443%2F%25E5%258D%2597%25E9%259D%259E%25E9%2596%258B%25E6%2599%25AE%25E6%2595%25A6%25E4%25BB%25A5%25E5%25A4%2596-%25E5%2585%25A8%25E7%2590%258311%25E5%259F%258E%25E5%25B8%2582%25E7%25BC%25BA%25E6%25B0%25B4%25E5%258D%25B1%25E6%25A9%259F%25E5%2580%2592%25E6%2595%25B8-%25E5%258C%2597%25E4%25BA%25AC%25E6%25A6%259C%25E4%25B8%258A%25E6%259C%2589%25E5%2590%258D&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-463"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-463">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Bearak, Barry. <a class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2008/05/23/world/africa/23safrica.html?_r=1&amp;ref=africa&amp;oref=slogin" rel="nofollow">Immigrants Fleeing Fury of South African Mobs</a>. The New York Times. 2008年5月23日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2008年8月5日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110501055725/http://www.nytimes.com/2008/05/23/world/africa/23safrica.html?_r=1&amp;ref=africa&amp;oref=slogin" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2011年5月1日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.atitle=Immigrants+Fleeing+Fury+of+South+African+Mobs&amp;rft.aufirst=Barry&amp;rft.aulast=Bearak&amp;rft.date=2008-05-23&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2008%2F05%2F23%2Fworld%2Fafrica%2F23safrica.html%3F_r%3D1%26ref%3Dafrica%26oref%3Dslogin&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-464"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-464">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Lehohla, Pali. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070814143522/http://www.statssa.gov.za/news_archive/05may2005_1.asp" rel="nofollow">Debate over race and censuses not peculiar to SA</a>. Business Report. 2005年5月5日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2013年8月25日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.statssa.gov.za/news_archive/05may2005_1.asp" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2007年8月14日）. <q>Others pointed out that the repeal of the Population Registration Act in 1991 removed any legal basis for specifying 'race'. The Identification Act of 1997 makes no mention of race. On the other hand, the Employment Equity Act speaks of 'designated groups' being 'black people, women and people with disabilities'. The Act defines 'black' as referring to 'Africans, coloureds and Indians'. Apartheid and the racial identification which underpinned it explicitly linked race with differential access to resources and power. If the post-apartheid order was committed to remedying this, race would have to be included in surveys and censuses, so that progress in eradicating the consequences of apartheid could be measured and monitored. This was the reasoning that led to a 'self-identifying' question about 'race' or 'population group' in both the 1996 and 2001 population censuses, and in Statistics SA's household survey programme.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.atitle=Debate+over+race+and+censuses+not+peculiar+to+SA&amp;rft.aufirst=Pali&amp;rft.aulast=Lehohla&amp;rft.date=2005-05-05&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.statssa.gov.za%2Fnews_archive%2F05may2005_1.asp&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-cib11-465"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-cib11_465-0"><sup><b>453.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cib11_465-1"><sup><b>453.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-cib11_465-2"><sup><b>453.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a class="external text" href="http://www.statssa.gov.za/census/census_2011/census_products/Census_2011_Census_in_brief.pdf" rel="nofollow">Census 2011: Census in brief</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. Pretoria: Statistics South Africa. 2012年: 23–25 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2018年7月11日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0-621-41388-5" title="Special:网络书源/978-0-621-41388-5"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0-621-41388-5</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150513171240/http://www.statssa.gov.za/census/census_2011/census_products/Census_2011_Census_in_brief.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2015年5月13日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=Census+2011%3A+Census+in+brief&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-621-41388-5&amp;rft.pages=23-25&amp;rft.place=Pretoria&amp;rft.pub=Statistics+South+Africa&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.statssa.gov.za%2Fcensus%2Fcensus_2011%2Fcensus_products%2FCensus_2011_Census_in_brief.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-466"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-466">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Study Commission on U.S. Policy toward Southern Africa (U.S.). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=sq43lnbklEUC&amp;pg=PA42" rel="nofollow">South Africa: time running out: the report of the Study Commission on U.S. Policy Toward Southern Africa</a>. <li id="cite_note-467"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-467">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://feng.ifeng.com/c/7nMqwoR8iG5" rel="nofollow">美国会成为第二个南非吗？</a>. 凤凰网. 2019年6月9日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2019年10月27日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20191027094343/https://feng.ifeng.com/c/7nMqwoR8iG5" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2019年10月27日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.btitle=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E6%9C%83%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E5%80%8B%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E5%97%8E%EF%BC%9F&amp;rft.date=2019-06-09&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E9%B3%B3%E5%87%B0%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ffeng.ifeng.com%2Fc%2F7nMqwoR8iG5&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-512"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-512">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Brink, André. <a class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2010/09/12/opinion/12brink.html" rel="nofollow">A Long Way From Mandela's Kitchen</a>. <li id="cite_note-569"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-569">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news"><a class="external text" href="https://www.thenewslens.com/article/2294" rel="nofollow">南非发现HIV抗体，爱滋病疫苗研发有望</a>. 关键评论网. 2014年3月5日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2020年2月10日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200215094021/https://www.thenewslens.com/article/2294" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020年2月15日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;rft.atitle=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E%E7%99%BC%E7%8F%BEHIV%E6%8A%97%E9%AB%94%EF%BC%8C%E6%84%9B%E6%BB%8B%E7%97%85%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E7%A0%94%E7%99%BC%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%9B&amp;rft.date=2014-03-05&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thenewslens.com%2Farticle%2F2294&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-570"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-570">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://theconversation.com/south-africa-has-excelled-in-treating-hiv-prevention-remains-a-disaster-51501" rel="nofollow">South Africa has excelled in treating HIV – prevention remains a disaster</a>. <h2><span id=".E5.BB.B6.E4.BC.B8.E9.96.B1.E8.AE.80"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="延伸阅读">延伸阅读</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E&amp;action=edit&amp;section=52" title="编辑章节：延伸阅读">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r61209943">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{list-style-type:none;margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>dl>dd{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em;list-style:none}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}</style><div class="refbegin" style="">
<ul><li><i>A History of South Africa, Third Edition</i>. Leonard Thompson. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Yale_University_Press" title="Yale University Press">Yale University Press</a>. 2001年3月1日. 384页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/0-300-08776-4" title="Special:网络书源/0-300-08776-4">0-300-08776-4</a>.</li>
<li><i>Economic Analysis and Policy Formulation for Post-Apartheid South Africa: Mission Report, 1991年8月</i>. International Development Research Centre. IDRC Canada, 1991年. vi, 46 p. Without ISBN</li>
<li><i>Emerging Johannesburg: Perspectives on the Postapartheid City</i>. Richard Tomlinson, et al. 2003年1月1日. 336页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/0-415-93559-8" title="Special:网络书源/0-415-93559-8">0-415-93559-8</a>.</li>
<li><i>Making of Modern South Africa: Conquest, Segregation and Apartheid</i>. Nigel Worden. 2000年7月1日. 194页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/0-631-21661-8" title="Special:网络书源/0-631-21661-8">0-631-21661-8</a>.</li>
<li><i>South Africa: A Narrative History</i>. <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Frank_Welsh_(writer)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Frank Welsh (writer)（页面不存在）">Frank Welsh</a>. Kodansha America. 1999年2月1日. 606页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/1-56836-258-7" title="Special:网络书源/1-56836-258-7">1-56836-258-7</a>.</li>
<li><i>South Africa in Contemporary Times</i>. <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Godfrey_Mwakikagile&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Godfrey Mwakikagile（页面不存在）">Godfrey Mwakikagile</a>. New Africa Press. 2008年2月. 260页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0-9802587-3-8" title="Special:网络书源/978-0-9802587-3-8">978-0-9802587-3-8</a>.</li>
<li><i>The Atlas of Changing South Africa</i>. A. J. Christopher. 2000年10月1日. 216页. <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/0-415-21178-6" title="Special:网络书源/0-415-21178-6">0-415-21178-6</a>.</li>

<li><a class="external text" href="https://www.parliament.gov.za/" rel="nofollow">议会</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20171114174150/https://www.parliament.gov.za/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.dirco.gov.za/" rel="nofollow">外交部</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20181224233526/http://www.dirco.gov.za/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>

<dl><dt>维基百科姊妹计划</dt></dl>
<ul><li><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="193" data-file-width="193" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/16px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/24px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/32px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 2x" width="16"/> <a href="/wiki/%E7%BB%B4%E5%9F%BA%E5%AF%BC%E6%B8%B8" title="维基导游">维基导游</a>上<a class="extiw" href="https://zh.wikivoyage.org/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E9%9D%9E#Q258" title="voy:南非">有关南非的旅行指南</a></li>
<li><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Wikimedia-logo.svg"><img alt="Wikimedia-logo.svg" data-file-height="1024" data-file-width="1024" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/15px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/23px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/30px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png 2x" width="15"/></a> <a class="extiw" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Atlas_of_South_Africa" title="commons:Atlas of South Africa">维基媒体的南非地图集</a> <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Gnome-globe.svg"><img alt="Gnome-globe.svg" data-file-height="48" data-file-width="48" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/15px-Gnome-globe.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/23px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/30px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 2x" width="15"/></a><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span></li></ul>
